T02TD1251E:214a-1: ratna dzv'a la s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD1251E:214a-3: rin chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1251E:214a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:214a-5: rtog pas brtags pa'i gnas don ji snyed la //
T02TD1251E:214a-6: khyab par bzhugs nas de dag sdud mdzad pa //
T02TD1251E:214a-7: shes rab thabs gnyis dga' bzhi thig le bzhi //
T02TD1251E:214a-8: sku bzhi spros pas 'gro don mdzad 'dud //
T02TD1251E:214a-9: ha cang rgyas dang ha cang bsdus pa yis //
T02TD1251E:214a-10: 'jigs pa bdag dang de 'dra rnams kyi phyir //

T02TD1251E:214a-13: rnal 'byor pa gang nyan thos dang //

T02TD1251E:214a-16: sngags rgyud sbyor bas bde byed cing //
T02TD1251E:214a-17: rdo rje dril bu'i ye shes dang //
T02TD1251E:214a-18: lha dang dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD1251E:214a-19: sngags dang rdul tshon gtor ma dang //
T02TD1251E:214a-20: dbang bskur de nyid bcu rig pas //

T02TD1251E:214a-24: bdud rtsi lnga dang dris byugs nas//
T02TD1251E:214a-25: sgrub pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD1251E:214a-27: las kyi cho ga gang dag la //
T02TD1251E:214a-29: dngos dang dngos bral kun ngo bo //
T02TD1251E:214a-30: kye yi rdo rje 'khor bcas la //
T02TD1251E:214a-31: mchod gtor ldan par thun bzhir bsgom //
T02TD1251E:214b-0: thun mtshams bzlas pa 'bum @214b mam khre //
T02TD1251E:214b-1: yang na mtshan bzang mthong ba ste //
T02TD1251E:214b-2: tshogs 'phel bgegs zhi don grub pa'o //
T02TD1251E:214b-3: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las bsnyen pa'i bya ba ste dang pa'o /
T02TD1251E:214b-5: // / mkhas pas grong dang grong khyer dang //
T02TD1251E:214b-6: ri bo 'am sa phyogs nyams dga' ba'am //
T02TD1251E:214b-7: me tog tshal dang dben gnas dang //
T02TD1251E:214b-8: rgyal sras khyim mam dkyil 'khor sar //
T02TD1251E:214b-10: dang por sa ni legs par brtag / chu ni g-yas 'khor shar dang byang //
T02TD1251E:214b-11: dma' ba dkar sogs gru bzhi sogs //
T02TD1251E:214b-12: brkos nas slar bkang lhag gyur pa //
T02TD1251E:214b-13: khru phyed brkos nas chu yis dgang //
T02TD1251E:214b-14: gom pa brgyar ni 'gro bar bya //
T02TD1251E:214b-15: myur 'ongs de ltar nyid nas bsngags //
T02TD1251E:214b-16: au dumw'a ra n+ya gro dha //
T02TD1251E:214b-17: aa shva dtha dang p'a la sha / ba ku la dang aa rdzu nar //
T02TD1251E:214b-18: bcas pa rus sbal rgyab 'dra spang //
T02TD1251E:214b-19: rang bdag sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1251E:214b-20: de nas sa ni bslang bar bya ;
T02TD1251E:214b-21: / sa phyogs 'dir bdag che ge mo //
T02TD1251E:214b-22: dkyil 'khor rgyal po kye rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:214b-23: bzhengs kyis 'di na gnas pa'i bgegs //
T02TD1251E:214b-25: dgun zlar ba sogs brtsams te //
T02TD1251E:214b-28: bltas te g-yon pa'i zur gyis nyal //
T02TD1251E:214b-29: pus mo lte ba rked tsam du //
T02TD1251E:214b-30: dngos grub rjes mthun lto nas brko //
T02TD1251E:214b-31: phub ma gseg ma rdo ba dang //
T02TD1251E:214b-32: shing bu sol ba la sogs dor //
T02TD1251E:214b-33: rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug / de nas shin tu 'thas par brdung //
T02TD1251E:214b-34: gal te de ltar ma nus na //
T02TD1251E:214b-35: mkhar bsams lag mnan sngags 'di bzla //
T02TD1251E:214b-36: aom ha na ha na kro dha h'u% phat /
T02TD1251E:214b-38: sa nam mkhar byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1251E:214b-39: mchod dang gtor mar ldan par ni //
T02TD1251E:214b-40: rim bzhin bsgoms te mtshan ma brtag / bkra mi shis na spong ba 'am //
T02TD1251E:214b-41: drag po'i sbyin sreg zhi ba'ang bya //
T02TD1251E:214b-42: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yis //
T02TD1251E:214b-43: bgegs dgra tshar bcad bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:214b-44: rdo rje ra ba bla re gur //
T02TD1251E:214b-45: h'u% las gsal bar bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:214b-47: rtsibs bcu bh'u% las bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:214b-48: der ni h'u% bcu'i sbyor ba las //

T02TD1251E:215a-0: @215a * // gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar //
T02TD1251E:215a-1: padma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed //

T02TD1251E:215a-3: stobs chen mi g-yo mgon po dang //

T02TD1251E:215a-12: mi phyed bdud rtsi thab sbyor la'o //
T02TD1251E:215a-13: dakki rgyal po lcags kyu ste //
T02TD1251E:215a-14: dbyig sngon can la rang gi ming //
T02TD1251E:215a-15: stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa //
T02TD1251E:215a-16: mi g-yo mgon po rdo rje ste //
T02TD1251E:215a-17: tsha skyob dkar po rgyal po yi //
T02TD1251E:215a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1251E:215a-19: gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la'o //
T02TD1251E:215a-20: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas gnas ba'o //
T02TD1251E:215a-21: dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar //
T02TD1251E:215a-22: mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:215a-23: gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni //
T02TD1251E:215a-25: padma'i khro bo dmar po che //
T02TD1251E:215a-26: rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag nyid gnag / mtshams kyi khro bo cher gnag cing //
T02TD1251E:215a-28: gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te //
T02TD1251E:215a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' dbyig pa can //
T02TD1251E:215a-30: padma'i khro bo rnams gzigs rjes //
T02TD1251E:215a-31: rdo rje sems dpas thal sbyor la'o //
T02TD1251E:215a-32: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02TD1251E:215a-33: rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:215a-35: khro bo bcu rnams bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:215a-36: srung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che //
T02TD1251E:215a-37: bskal pa'i me lta 'bar ba ste //
T02TD1251E:215a-38: 'khor zhing rab tu mi g-yo bar //
T02TD1251E:215a-39: dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam mo //
T02TD1251E:215a-40: aom ra ksha ra ksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:215a-41: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las sa'i cho ga'i bya ba ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1251E:215a-43: // / blo ldan 'khor lo'i sa dbus su //
T02TD1251E:215a-44: legs ldan sngon 'gro nas brtsams te //
T02TD1251E:215a-45: mchog bstod par gyi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1251E:215a-46: sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab //

T02TD1251E:215a-48: mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:215a-49: rdo rje 'chang chen che ge mo //
T02TD1251E:215b-0: @215b / bdag ni kyee yi rdo rje yi //
T02TD1251E:215b-2: bdag gi bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:215b-3: mthu chen ldan pa khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1251E:215b-4: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02TD1251E:215b-5: dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin la //
T02TD1251E:215b-6: slob ma 'am 'khor sprul gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1251E:215b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1251E:215b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1251E:215b-9: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:215b-10: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1251E:215b-11: mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02TD1251E:215b-12: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:215b-13: zhi ba chos mchog las byung ba //
T02TD1251E:215b-14: ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod mdzad //
T02TD1251E:215b-15: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:215b-16: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1251E:215b-17: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02TD1251E:215b-18: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog /
T02TD1251E:215b-19: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:215b-20: langs te mkha' bzhugs rgyal phyag bya //
T02TD1251E:215b-21: sangs rgyas kun sbyor nga rgyal bskyed //
T02TD1251E:215b-22: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bdag //
T02TD1251E:215b-23: rdo rje nyi ma'ang bdag nyid de /
T02TD1251E:215b-24: don yod rdo rje chos bdag nyid //
T02TD1251E:215b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
T02TD1251E:215b-26: de nas kye rdor khros bltas nas //
T02TD1251E:215b-27: 'khor lo mkha' la gdegs par bya //
T02TD1251E:215b-28: yi ge ma tas nyi zla'i mig / phyir dus thams cad sbar ba dang //
T02TD1251E:215b-29: blo ldan 'gro la bltas nas ni //
T02TD1251E:215b-30: 'khor lo'i sa ni yongs su bskor //
T02TD1251E:215b-32: rdo rje gsor bar shin tu brtson //
T02TD1251E:215b-33: rol pa'i rdo rje 'gros kyi gar //
T02TD1251E:215b-34: mche ba gtsigs bcas h'u% sgrogs pas //
T02TD1251E:215b-35: me tog snyim pa'i sbyor bas bya //
T02TD1251E:215b-36: spos la yal ga'i sbyor ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:215b-37: mar me mthe bong brtan par bya //
T02TD1251E:215b-38: byug pa de yi rnam pa yang //
T02TD1251E:215b-39: lag pas mig dang de bzhin rna //
T02TD1251E:215b-40: rkang pa zur gyi g-yas phyogs su //
T02TD1251E:215b-41: pheg rdob pa yi sbyor bas bya //
T02TD1251E:215b-42: de bzhin du yang g-yon du bskor //
T02TD1251E:215b-43: rgyun gyi gar byas de 'og tu //
T02TD1251E:215b-44: bskyod pa'i gar byas de yi rjes //
T02TD1251E:215b-45: myur bskor de bzhin gar byas te //
T02TD1251E:215b-47: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba //
T02TD1251E:216a-2: rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-7: khro bo'i gom pa ste rkang stabs kyi bkod pa'o //
T02TD1251E:216a-18: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang /

T02TD1251E:216a-21: sna tshogs dbyig pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-23: gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-35: pi wang gi lag pa dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-37: ku mu ta'i lag pa ste /
T02TD1251E:216a-55: drug gis rjes su bskyed pa'i glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-56: drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-57: dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-58: bar ma'i rjes gyi glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-59: lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-60: blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-66: dbye ba phyed phyi ba dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-68: 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-69: dkyus gsum len par byed pa dang /
T02TD1251E:216a-73: so nyed pa ste glu'i dgod pa'o //
T02TD1251E:216a-74: sa gzhi yongs bzung dus su yang //
T02TD1251E:216a-75: dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul ba /
T02TD1251E:216b-0: ye shes rdo rje @216b can gyis bya //
T02TD1251E:216b-1: 'di ni dam tshig rim pa mchog / lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1251E:216b-2: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams thams cad nyon //
T02TD1251E:216b-3: nga ni snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan //
T02TD1251E:216b-4: srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba po //
T02TD1251E:216b-5: rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus //
T02TD1251E:216b-6: sku gsum las ni skyes pa spro //
T02TD1251E:216b-7: gal te las la 'da' byed na /
T02TD1251E:216b-9: lus srul po dang kha cig gang //
T02TD1251E:216b-10: bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1251E:216b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes //
T02TD1251E:216b-12: zur cig bgegs ni chen po rnams //
T02TD1251E:216b-13: na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo na mo badzra khro dh'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-14: ma h'a dam shto ta ka ta bhee ra w'a badzra sando ha da rb'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-15: aa mri ta kunda li h'u% phat ces bya ba'am /
T02TD1251E:216b-16: na ma: sa manta k'a ya b'a ka tsi tta badzra na ma /
T02TD1251E:216b-17: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-18: ma h'a dam shto ta ka ra bhee ra b'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-20: pa ra shu sha gri hi ta ha st'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-21: aom aa mri ta ku nda li /
T02TD1251E:216b-22: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1251E:216b-28: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-31: ma h'a ga na pa ti /
T02TD1251E:216b-32: dzi pi ta aa nta ka r'a ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-33: h'u% h'u% phat phat ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1251E:216b-34: de ltar sa ni yongs bzung la /
T02TD1251E:216b-35: bgegs med phyir ni phyur bu gdab //
T02TD1251E:216b-36: stong du bgegs 'joms khro bo la /
T02TD1251E:216b-37: smad du rtse gcig bsams nas gdab//
T02TD1251E:216b-40: grihn'a ba ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD1251E:216b-41: a'a na ya ho bha ga w'a na /
T02TD1251E:216b-44: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1251E:216b-46: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02TD1251E:216b-47: h'u% h'u% h'u% badzra k'i la ya phat /
T02TD1251E:216b-48: badzra dha rod a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya b'a ka tsi tt'a badzra nam k'i la h'u% phat /
T02TD1251E:216b-49: bgegs med sa ni phyogs bcings nas //
T02TD1251E:216b-50: de nas lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1251E:216b-51: mchod gtor rgya chen bshams nas kyang //
T02TD1251E:216b-52: dkyil 'khor dbus su dris byugs nas //

T02TD1251E:216b-55: kye yi rdo rje khros mchod pa'i //

T02TD1251E:216b-57: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD1251E:216b-59: lha yi gnas su nges pa der //

T02TD1251E:216b-61: sa byugs me tog tshom bu dgram //
T02TD1251E:216b-62: mkhas pas lha yi gnas de la //

T02TD1251E:217a-0: @217a * // spyan drangs mchod bstod bar du bya //
T02TD1251E:217a-1: de nas slob ldan pus btsugs te //
T02TD1251E:217a-2: lag par spos thogs gsol ba gdab //

T02TD1251E:217a-4: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-5: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:217a-6: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis //
T02TD1251E:217a-8: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD1251E:217a-9: de ni gnang ba mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD1251E:217a-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-12: gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-13: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-14: gang yang 'byung po mthu can dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-15: gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02TD1251E:217a-16: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD1251E:217a-17: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:217a-18: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD1251E:217a-19: kye yi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1251E:217a-20: 'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:217a-22: deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD1251E:217a-23: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02TD1251E:217a-24: dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs pa kun //
T02TD1251E:217a-25: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:217a-26: de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas //
T02TD1251E:217a-27: bum pa lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1251E:217a-28: bum pa nag po ra ri med //
T02TD1251E:217a-29: mgrin pa ring ba lto che ba /
T02TD1251E:217a-30: dkar pos byugs te mtshan mas gdab //
T02TD1251E:217a-31: kha rnams yal ga gos rgyan du //
T02TD1251E:217a-32: til dang gro dang sran ma dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-34: ha sa de ba ka pi re //
T02TD1251E:217a-35: kri ta dzam li bri ha pa la //
T02TD1251E:217a-36: karni ka ni sman lnga yin //
T02TD1251E:217a-37: gser dngul mu tig byu ru dang //
T02TD1251E:217a-39: mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi mngar //
T02TD1251E:217a-40: lan tshva spos dang dri bzangs gzhug / h'u% bdun bzlas pa'i srad bu dkar //
T02TD1251E:217a-41: me tog phreng btags rdo rje ni //
T02TD1251E:217a-42: dri chur bcug pa steng du gzhag / bum par lha bskyed mchod nas ni //
T02TD1251E:217a-43: phreng ba'i mgo nas lag bzung la //
T02TD1251E:217a-44: nyin re bzhin du thun gsum du //
T02TD1251E:217a-45: gtor ma byin zhing bzlas par bya //
T02TD1251E:217a-46: de nas bum pa so sor gzhag / las kun byed pa byang shar du'o //
T02TD1251E:217a-47: slob ma yan lag kun rdzogs shing //
T02TD1251E:217a-48: shin tu dul dang spyod pa zhi //
T02TD1251E:217b-0: chos gsum la ni @217b mngon dga' zhing //
T02TD1251E:217b-1: theg pa che la dga' ba'i blo //
T02TD1251E:217b-2: sngags dang rgyud la sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-3: bzo sogs thams cad rtog 'dod cing //
T02TD1251E:217b-4: sbyor dang bsam gtan dga' ba dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-5: nyan dang klog la brtson pa dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-6: rtag tu bla ma gus 'dod dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-7: sbyin pa la sogs dge la dga' //
T02TD1251E:217b-8: de bzhin 'dod la mi dga' ba //
T02TD1251E:217b-9: longs spyod la ni mi gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:217b-10: nga rgyal khro ba med pa gzung //
T02TD1251E:217b-11: gang zhig tshul khrims 'tshal ba dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-12: slob dpon dang ni rgan pa'i lha //
T02TD1251E:217b-13: sems can kun la smod pa dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-14: ngan pa'i bdag nyid gdug sems dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-15: rtag tu sdig pa'i blo ngan dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-16: tshig rkyal ngag rtsub smra ba rnams //
T02TD1251E:217b-18: gal te bde gshegs dgongs pa ni //
T02TD1251E:217b-19: sgrub pa don gnyer brtson ldan na //
T02TD1251E:217b-20: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa 'am //
T02TD1251E:217b-21: dman pa 'am lhag gnas bya bar rigs //
T02TD1251E:217b-22: ston pas de la 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1251E:217b-26: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes //
T02TD1251E:217b-29: de skad brjod nas slob ma de //
T02TD1251E:217b-30: rtag par bsams la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1251E:217b-31: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02TD1251E:217b-32: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:217b-33: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD1251E:217b-34: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:217b-35: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD1251E:217b-36: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1251E:217b-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1251E:217b-38: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1251E:217b-39: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1251E:217b-41: de skad lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02TD1251E:217b-42: de nas dpa' bos slob ma yi //
T02TD1251E:217b-43: yon tan dmigs byas tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD1251E:217b-44: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD1251E:217b-45: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD1251E:217b-46: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD1251E:217b-47: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1251E:217b-48: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-49: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD1251E:217b-50: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD1251E:217b-51: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD1251E:218a-0: @218a * // de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1251E:218a-1: cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD1251E:218a-2: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD1251E:218a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD1251E:218a-4: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de //
T02TD1251E:218a-5: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yi //
T02TD1251E:218a-6: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD1251E:218a-7: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD1251E:218a-8: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:218a-9: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig //
T02TD1251E:218a-10: de ltar slob ma la gdams nas //
T02TD1251E:218a-11: 'di skad ces kyang brjod du gzhug / bdag gis thog ma med dus nas //
T02TD1251E:218a-12: log rtog dbang gis sdig bgyis pas //
T02TD1251E:218a-13: thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyed rnams kyi //
T02TD1251E:218a-14: spyan sngar bshags bgyid slan chad sdom //
T02TD1251E:218a-15: rgyal dang de yi sras rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:218a-16: 'gro ba'i bsod nams ma lus pa //
T02TD1251E:218a-17: de la yang dag yi rang zhing //
T02TD1251E:218a-18: byang chub dam par bsngo bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:218a-20: de dang de yi skur ston pa //
T02TD1251E:218a-21: sna tshogs gzugs nor ji lta bu'i //
T02TD1251E:218a-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1251E:218a-23: kun rtog ma lus dag gyur pa //
T02TD1251E:218a-24: rang rig yang dag ye shes bskyed //
T02TD1251E:218a-25: lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1251E:218a-26: dam pa'i chos la 'ang skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1251E:218a-27: go rims ji bzhin dbang bskur thob //
T02TD1251E:218a-28: ma log lam 'di nges gnas dang //
T02TD1251E:218a-30: rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1251E:218a-31: yang dag ye shes me bo che //
T02TD1251E:218a-32: gti mug mun pa bsal ba dang //
T02TD1251E:218a-33: sgrib pa ma lus sbyang ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:218a-34: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD1251E:218a-35: rgyal sras dpa' bo rnams kyi lam //
T02TD1251E:218a-36: spyod pa dpag yas gang yin dang //
T02TD1251E:218a-37: ma bcos ji bzhin gnas lam la //
T02TD1251E:218a-38: da ni yang dag gnas par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:218a-39: de nas bla mas byang chub sems //
T02TD1251E:218a-40: ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1251E:218a-41: bskyed pa slar yang dran du gzhug / las kun byed pas bsrungs nas ni //
T02TD1251E:218a-42: snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru //
T02TD1251E:218a-43: rdo rje padma 'khor lo dag / h'u% a'a: aom las de dag dgod //
T02TD1251E:218a-44: spos chu rdo rje khu tshur dag //
T02TD1251E:218a-45: snying ga lkog ma spyi bor gtug / de bzhin h'u% a'a: aom brjod bya //
T02TD1251E:218a-47: me tog la sogs rim bzhin byin //
T02TD1251E:218a-48: spyi bor me tog mdun du spos //
T02TD1251E:218a-49: mar me dri ni snying ga ru //
T02TD1251E:218b-0: kun byed bzlas @218b nas gus pa yi //
T02TD1251E:218b-1: slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:218b-2: aa shva ta au dum b'a ra yi //
T02TD1251E:218b-3: so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD1251E:218b-4: ma yo ma gas srog chags med //
T02TD1251E:218b-5: rtse mo me tog bcas pa byin //
T02TD1251E:218b-6: shar ram byang du kha bltas gzhag / bcas nas ltos pa med par ni //
T02TD1251E:218b-7: ba ko tsam tu byugs par dor ;
T02TD1251E:218b-8: / zhi ba la sogs dngos grub bstan //
T02TD1251E:218b-10: aom a'a dzi hva sam bardha ni h'u% phat /
T02TD1251E:218b-11: so shing la bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1251E:218b-12: aom hr'i bi shuddha sarba dha rm'a sarba p'a pam ni shtsa sye sho dha ya sarba bi ka lpa na aa pa na ya h'u%/
T02TD1251E:218b-14: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i //
T02TD1251E:218b-15: srung skud dpung pa g-yas par btags //
T02TD1251E:218b-16: ku sha'i snying po rtse ma nyams //
T02TD1251E:218b-17: dhi las byung ba bsam par bya //
T02TD1251E:218b-18: dang por spyi bor gcig gzung bya //
T02TD1251E:218b-19: gzhan dag sngas dang stan phyir byin //
T02TD1251E:218b-20: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02TD1251E:218b-21: au dum b'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD1251E:218b-22: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD1251E:218b-23: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02TD1251E:218b-24: de bas kyang ni dkon pa de //
T02TD1251E:218b-25: gang zhig mnyam med sems can don //
T02TD1251E:218b-26: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD1251E:218b-27: bskal pa bye ba du mar ni //
T02TD1251E:218b-28: sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang //
T02TD1251E:218b-31: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02TD1251E:218b-32: tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD1251E:218b-33: skyob pa gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02TD1251E:218b-35: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD1251E:218b-36: blo gros shin tu mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1251E:218b-37: de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun //
T02TD1251E:218b-39: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1251E:218b-40: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD1251E:218b-41: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02TD1251E:218b-42: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02TD1251E:218b-43: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD1251E:218b-44: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02TD1251E:218b-45: de phyir khyed rnams theg can la //
T02TD1251E:218b-46: sang ni rab tu snye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:218b-47: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1251E:218b-48: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1251E:218b-49: khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02TD1251E:219a-2: /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD1251E:219a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:219a-4: don bshad srung ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1251E:219a-5: ku sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug / rmi lam gang dag ci mthong ba //
T02TD1251E:219a-6: de kun dang por nga la smros //
T02TD1251E:219a-7: rmi lam bzang ngan dris nas ni //
T02TD1251E:219a-8: mi dge thab sbyor dag gis gzhom //
T02TD1251E:219a-9: dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa las //
T02TD1251E:219a-10: sta gon bya ba ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD1251E:219a-12: // / mkhas pas mnyam zhing yid 'ong bar //
T02TD1251E:219a-13: ba yi lnga dang bdud rtse lnga //
T02TD1251E:219a-14: dri zhim chu yi legs byug pa //
T02TD1251E:219a-15: phyi yi rgya ni khru bdun pa //
T02TD1251E:219a-16: nang gi khru gsum mthe bong gsum //
T02TD1251E:219a-17: dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1251E:219a-18: thig skud gsar pa mdzes par ldan //
T02TD1251E:219a-19: rigs lnga'i sa bon de mdog byung //
T02TD1251E:219a-20: ye shes lnga ldan srad bu gang //
T02TD1251E:219a-21: lnga phrag lnga ni rnam phye ba //
T02TD1251E:219a-22: nyi zla'i 'bar mig lcags kyus dgug / las kun byed pa'i srad bu yang //
T02TD1251E:219a-23: gtsang mas legs bkal dri zhim dang //
T02TD1251E:219a-24: bdud rtsis spang zhing yi ge gsum //
T02TD1251E:219a-25: thig 'dzin grogs dang bsgril bar bya //
T02TD1251E:219a-26: dzdza yis btang zhing rang yang zlo //
T02TD1251E:219a-27: khu tshur g-yon pas lte bar gzung //
T02TD1251E:219a-28: nub dang shar nas blo ldan gyis //
T02TD1251E:219a-31: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'u%/
T02TD1251E:219a-32: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1251E:219a-33: khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad dus lags //
T02TD1251E:219a-34: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
T02TD1251E:219a-35: de rnams 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:219a-36: ltas ngan gyis ni dngos mi 'grub //
T02TD1251E:219a-37: thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi //
T02TD1251E:219a-38: ring thung khyer na nad kyis thebs //
T02TD1251E:219a-39: phyogs 'khrul ba yis slob ma dang //
T02TD1251E:219a-40: slob dpon la yang nyes par gsungs //
T02TD1251E:219a-41: slob dpon slob ma shar nub tu //
T02TD1251E:219a-42: bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gdab bya //
T02TD1251E:219a-44: phyed dang phyed du bgos byas la //
T02TD1251E:219a-45: phyed kyi phyed na lho byang du //
T02TD1251E:219a-46: bya rog rjes btsal tshangs thig gdab //
T02TD1251E:219a-47: de nas dkyil 'khor phyed tshad kyi //
T02TD1251E:219a-48: g-yas dang g-yon du rgya gram bya //
T02TD1251E:219a-49: shar nub phyogs dang lho phyogs thig / byang lho shar nub bltas pas gdab //
T02TD1251E:219a-50: mer gnas rlung bltas bden bral nas //
T02TD1251E:219b-0: dbang ldan @219b bltas te tshangs thig gdab //
T02TD1251E:219b-1: phyed la phyed phyed phyed du bgo / tshangs thig ngos rer brgyad brgyad 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:219b-2: dang po phyed rgyab de nang phyed //
T02TD1251E:219b-3: sngar byas sgo khyud phyed nyid dkyil //
T02TD1251E:219b-4: gnyis pa phyed phyed dang po la //
T02TD1251E:219b-5: phyed phyed byas pa logs zhes bya //
T02TD1251E:219b-6: de rgyab me tog chun 'phyang te /
T02TD1251E:219b-7: de rgyab rta babs ka ba yin //
T02TD1251E:219b-8: gsum pa'i phyed rgyab de phyed nang //
T02TD1251E:219b-9: rdor phreng bzhi pa lha snam yin //
T02TD1251E:219b-10: lnga pa'i phyed phyed dang po la //
T02TD1251E:219b-11: phyed phyed byas pa tshon lnga'i gnas //
T02TD1251E:219b-12: bar gnyis 'dod yon mthar lngar byas //
T02TD1251E:219b-13: sgo 'gram rin chen pha gu 'ang de //
T02TD1251E:219b-14: drug pa'i phyed nang mu tig phreng //
T02TD1251E:219b-15: de rgyab phyed nang phyed phyed byas //
T02TD1251E:219b-16: ya phubs tha ma rdo rje gdung //
T02TD1251E:219b-17: bdun pa rta babs dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:219b-19: de rgyab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1251E:219b-20: sna tshogs padma rdo rje rva //
T02TD1251E:219b-21: me 'od rim bzhin bskor bar bya //
T02TD1251E:219b-22: de nas mkhas pas tshon rnams la //
T02TD1251E:219b-23: bh'u% ao% dzr'i% kha% h'u% rnams kyis //
T02TD1251E:219b-24: rdul tshon lha yi rnam par sbyor //
T02TD1251E:219b-25: 'bar ba'i blta bya ye shes sbar //
T02TD1251E:219b-26: yang dag gzi bskyed sngags bzlas mchod //
T02TD1251E:219b-27: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'u% //
T02TD1251E:219b-28: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD1251E:219b-29: sems can khams ni dag par byed //
T02TD1251E:219b-30: kye yi rdo rje rgyal chen gyi //
T02TD1251E:219b-31: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya //
T02TD1251E:219b-32: bla mas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis //
T02TD1251E:219b-33: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD1251E:219b-34: dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1251E:219b-35: ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid //
T02TD1251E:219b-36: mnyam zhing g-yas bskor rgyun ma chad //
T02TD1251E:219b-37: ma yo bar ni tshon rtsi dgye //
T02TD1251E:219b-38: sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni //
T02TD1251E:219b-39: ri mo mnyam par dgye par bya //
T02TD1251E:219b-40: sbom por skye bas nad kyis 'debs //
T02TD1251E:219b-41: phra mos nor ni rnam par 'jig / yon pos rnam 'gras chad pa yis //
T02TD1251E:219b-42: bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi //
T02TD1251E:219b-43: g-yas bskor min par skye ba yis //
T02TD1251E:219b-44: tshon ni phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:219b-45: dkar po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD1251E:219b-46: gnyis pa gser las dmigs pa ste //
T02TD1251E:219b-47: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin rtse //
T02TD1251E:219b-48: de bzhin gzhan dag margad yin //
T02TD1251E:219b-49: nag po nang du shes bya ste //
T02TD1251E:219b-50: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02TD1251E:219b-51: shar du dkar po chen po ste //
T02TD1251E:219b-52: lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan //
T02TD1251E:220a-2: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02TD1251E:220a-3: dbus kyi sa gzhi'i cha dag ni //
T02TD1251E:220a-5: brtag par bdag nyid shes rab thabs //

T02TD1251E:220a-7: ri mo bar ni nas gang gis //
T02TD1251E:220a-8: ma reg par ni bri bar bya ;
T02TD1251E:220a-9: / kha sbyor gcig pa sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1251E:220a-10: sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab //
T02TD1251E:220a-11: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1251E:220a-12: rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1251E:220a-13: ri mo lnga dang nges par ldan //

T02TD1251E:220a-15: rin chen lnga phyed rang bzhin nam //

T02TD1251E:220a-18: de bzhin dur khrod sol bas so //
T02TD1251E:220a-20: brgyad pa ge sar ldan pa bri //

T02TD1251E:220a-22: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri //
T02TD1251E:220a-23: dbang ldan du ni seng ge ste //
T02TD1251E:220a-24: me yi mtshams ni dge slong ngo //
T02TD1251E:220a-25: bden bral du ni 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1251E:220a-26: rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02TD1251E:220a-27: shar gyi sgor ni gri gug bri //
T02TD1251E:220a-28: lhor ni cang te'u bri bar bya //
T02TD1251E:220a-29: nub du rus sbal bri bya ste //
T02TD1251E:220a-30: de bzhin sbrul ni byang du'o //
T02TD1251E:220a-31: lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis //
T02TD1251E:220a-32: phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags //
T02TD1251E:220a-33: bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs sogs //
T02TD1251E:220a-34: bla rgyan 'og rgyan bre bar bya //
T02TD1251E:220a-35: mchod gtor rgya cher bshams bkram la //
T02TD1251E:220a-36: 'bar mig la sogs gong lta bur //
T02TD1251E:220a-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i bsnyems byas la //
T02TD1251E:220a-38: rkang pa g-yas pa brgyang byas te //

T02TD1251E:220a-46: ma dag ma tshang skyon rnams bsal //
