T02TD1251E:220a-48: sbyor tshogs gtso bo'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1251E:220a-49: dkyil 'khor sprul pa rdul tshon dang /
T02TD1251E:220a-50: gnyis med mkhar gnas kyang der gzhug / byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur gyi //
T02TD1251E:220a-51: bar rdzogs byas nas 'chad pa yi //
T02TD1251E:220a-52: cho gas dkyil 'khor rab tu mchod //
T02TD1251E:220a-53: rang lces rdo rje bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1251E:220b-0: phyi rol @220b 'byung pos gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1251E:220b-1: snga gro rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1251E:220b-2: ma dag la sogs nyes pa rnams //
T02TD1251E:220b-3: rgyal ba rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1251E:220b-4: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las /
T02TD1251E:220b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1251E:220b-7: // / de nas slob dpon rang lta yi //
T02TD1251E:220b-8: sbyor gnas dkyil 'khor legs bltas la //
T02TD1251E:220b-9: mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD1251E:220b-10: phyi nang sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //
T02TD1251E:220b-11: 'khor lo mchod de bdag nyid kyang //
T02TD1251E:220b-12: slob ma'i rim bzhin dbang blangs la //
T02TD1251E:220b-13: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'khor lo ru //
T02TD1251E:220b-14: slob ma gzhug phyir bden pa bsgrags //
T02TD1251E:220b-15: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD1251E:220b-16: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD1251E:220b-17: kye yi rdo rje deng 'grub mdzod //
T02TD1251E:220b-18: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD1251E:220b-19: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1251E:220b-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD1251E:220b-21: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1251E:220b-22: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod //
T02TD1251E:220b-23: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD1251E:220b-24: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1251E:220b-25: bcom ldan de nyid kyis 'grub mdzod //
T02TD1251E:220b-26: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1251E:220b-27: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1251E:220b-28: byang chub sems dpas bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1251E:220b-29: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgyal mchog gis //
T02TD1251E:220b-30: grub pa'i rdo rje cher ston pa //
T02TD1251E:220b-31: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02TD1251E:220b-32: sems can kun gyi yid la zhugs //
T02TD1251E:220b-33: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02TD1251E:220b-34: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o //
T02TD1251E:220b-35: bden pa dag gis ye shes mchog //
T02TD1251E:220b-36: shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1251E:220b-37: bden pa de yis mgon bdag la //
T02TD1251E:220b-38: khyed kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod //
T02TD1251E:220b-39: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1251E:220b-40: dag cing gsal la rnyog ba med //
T02TD1251E:220b-41: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1251E:220b-42: rgyu dang las la kun du 'byung //
T02TD1251E:220b-43: de bzhin nyid la nges par skyes //
T02TD1251E:220b-45: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02TD1251E:220b-46: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /
T02TD1251E:220b-47: de ltar bstod cing phyag bgyis nas //
T02TD1251E:221a-3: slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:221a-4: sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs //
T02TD1251E:221a-5: bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:221a-6: de nas slob mas slob dpon gyi //
T02TD1251E:221a-7: zhabs la gtugs la 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1251E:221a-8: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD1251E:221a-9: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:221a-10: byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa //
T02TD1251E:221a-11: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:221a-12: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD1251E:221a-13: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1251E:221a-14: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1251E:221a-15: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1251E:221a-16: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1251E:221a-17: mgon po chen po bdag 'jug go //
T02TD1251E:221a-19: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD1251E:221a-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la'o //
T02TD1251E:221a-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD1251E:221a-22: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1251E:221a-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1251E:221a-24: blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-25: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:221a-26: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02TD1251E:221a-27: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-28: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD1251E:221a-29: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD1251E:221a-30: dam tshig sgom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD1251E:221a-31: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1251E:221a-32: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD1251E:221a-33: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD1251E:221a-34: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD1251E:221a-35: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD1251E:221a-36: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-38: dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad /
T02TD1251E:221a-39: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1251E:221a-40: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD1251E:221a-41: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-42: mchod pa'i las kyang mi nus bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-43: de las gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di //
T02TD1251E:221a-44: phas pham pas na rab tu bshad //
T02TD1251E:221a-45: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1251E:221a-46: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do //
T02TD1251E:221a-47: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD1251E:221a-48: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-50: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur /
T02TD1251E:221a-51: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD1251E:221a-52: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD1251E:221a-53: 'dod la log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD1251E:221a-54: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1251E:221b-0: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba @221b yi //
T02TD1251E:221b-1: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221b-2: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD1251E:221b-3: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD1251E:221b-4: dam pa nges par bsten bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:221b-5: rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD1251E:221b-6: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-7: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-8: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni ;
T02TD1251E:221b-9: / ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02TD1251E:221b-10: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD1251E:221b-11: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD1251E:221b-12: 'khor ba dag kyang yang mi spang //
T02TD1251E:221b-13: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD1251E:221b-14: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02TD1251E:221b-15: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:221b-16: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-18: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD1251E:221b-19: rjes mthun sngon pa rgya cher ni //
T02TD1251E:221b-20: gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad //
T02TD1251E:221b-21: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:221b-23: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1251E:221b-24: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
T02TD1251E:221b-25: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD1251E:221b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung //
T02TD1251E:221b-27: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02TD1251E:221b-28: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1251E:221b-29: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1251E:221b-30: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:221b-31: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas /
T02TD1251E:221b-32: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02TD1251E:221b-33: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:221b-34: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog / zhes lan gsum bzlas la /
T02TD1251E:221b-36: sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-37: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kun //
T02TD1251E:221b-38: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:221b-39: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02TD1251E:221b-40: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su //
T02TD1251E:221b-41: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02TD1251E:221b-42: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD1251E:221b-43: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1251E:221b-44: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1251E:221b-45: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:221b-46: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-47: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD1251E:221b-48: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD1251E:221b-49: bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung //
T02TD1251E:221b-50: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1251E:221b-51: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1251E:221b-52: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni //
T02TD1251E:222a-1: nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-2: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1251E:222a-3: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1251E:222a-4: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-5: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-6: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD1251E:222a-7: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD1251E:222a-8: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD1251E:222a-9: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD1251E:222a-10: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02TD1251E:222a-11: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD1251E:222a-12: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD1251E:222a-13: dam pa'i chos ni ma lus gzung //
T02TD1251E:222a-14: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1251E:222a-15: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD1251E:222a-16: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-17: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-18: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1251E:222a-19: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD1251E:222a-20: sems can kun don gyi phyir //
T02TD1251E:222a-21: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung //
T02TD1251E:222a-22: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-23: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD1251E:222a-24: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD1251E:222a-25: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD1251E:222a-27: de nas slob mas gos dmar pos //
T02TD1251E:222a-28: gdong g-yogs me tog phreng gzung la //
T02TD1251E:222a-29: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa'i chus //
T02TD1251E:222a-30: bsrung zhing sku gsung thugs sbyangs la //
T02TD1251E:222a-31: bu sdug khyod su ci la dga' //
T02TD1251E:222a-32: slob dpon gyis ni gzhug phyir dri //
T02TD1251E:222a-33: skal bzang bde chen bdag dga' zhes //
T02TD1251E:222a-34: slob ma blo chen gyis smra'o //
T02TD1251E:222a-35: de nas byang chub sems bskyed phyir //
T02TD1251E:222a-36: aom sa rba yo ga tsi tta au pa da y'a mi //
T02TD1251E:222a-37: brjod nas de yi snying gar ni //
T02TD1251E:222a-38: rdo rje bzhag cing bsams nas kyang //
T02TD1251E:222a-39: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
T02TD1251E:222a-40: si ddhi badzra ya th'a su kham //
T02TD1251E:222a-41: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlab par 'gyur gyis /
T02TD1251E:222a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog du gsang ba 'di /
T02TD1251E:222a-43: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / dad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yin no //
T02TD1251E:222a-45: goo r'i la sogs rang sngags kyis //
T02TD1251E:222a-46: dam pas dgug dang gzhug par bya //
T02TD1251E:222a-47: yi ge lnga yang de bzhin du //
T02TD1251E:222a-48: brjod de dam tshig mchog 'dzin gzhug //
T02TD1251E:222b-0: deng khyod de bzhin @222b gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD1251E:222b-1: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob nas /
T02TD1251E:222b-2: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis /
T02TD1251E:222b-3: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD1251E:222b-4: de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la //
T02TD1251E:222b-5: aom he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1251E:222b-6: snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur //
T02TD1251E:222b-7: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1251E:222b-8: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02TD1251E:222b-9: bdag gnas yi ge gsum gyis sbar //
T02TD1251E:222b-11: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1251E:222b-12: dam tshig nyams na sreg par 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:222b-13: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02TD1251E:222b-14: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / aom ba dzro da da ka /
T02TD1251E:222b-16: dam bcas brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:222b-18: deng phyin chad khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyis /
T02TD1251E:222b-19: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02TD1251E:222b-20: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig //
T02TD1251E:222b-21: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur te re zhes brjod la /
T02TD1251E:222b-22: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02TD1251E:222b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD1251E:222b-24: dpal he ru ka bdag la 'bab par gyur cig / ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD1251E:222b-25: de skad brjod nas de'i snying gar //
T02TD1251E:222b-26: dbang chen dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni //
T02TD1251E:222b-27: rdo rjes mtshan pa kha dog ser //
T02TD1251E:222b-28: lam las byung bar h'u% bsgom bya //
T02TD1251E:222b-29: ba% byung chu ni kha dog dkar //
T02TD1251E:222b-30: bum pas mtshan cing yongs su zlum //
T02TD1251E:222b-31: ya% las byung ba g-yo ba'i rlung //
T02TD1251E:222b-32: ba dan sngon pos mtshan gzhu'i dbyibs //
T02TD1251E:222b-33: de la sku gsum ha aa bsgom /
T02TD1251E:222b-35: rlung las ram byung gru gsum par //
T02TD1251E:222b-36: gnas par sbar la slob ma dbab //
T02TD1251E:222b-37: de nas 'jigs su rung ba yi //
T02TD1251E:222b-38: rdo rje glu dang gar bya'o //
T02TD1251E:222b-39: a'a be sha ya stvam bha ya /
T02TD1251E:222b-41: ts'a la ya ts'a la ya /
T02TD1251E:222b-42: h'u% aa he dzheem: lce la aa ni dmar po zhig / bsams te babs la slar yang bsgo //
T02TD1251E:223a-2: smros shig rdo rje dge mi dge / bsam pa de ni brtan bya ba /
T02TD1251E:223a-3: de la ti shtha ba dzra brjod //
T02TD1251E:223a-4: me tog phreng ba 'khor lo dor //
T02TD1251E:223a-5: pra ti tstsha badzra ho: zhes brjod do //
T02TD1251E:223a-6: gal te bzang por mi ltung na //
T02TD1251E:223a-7: lan gnyis bar du dor bar bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-8: de ni spyi bor bcing bar bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-9: pra ti grihna tv'am ai mam satva ma h'a ba la //
T02TD1251E:223a-10: blangs pa 'am ma blangs pa gnyis ni //
T02TD1251E:223a-11: mtshan ma'am mtshan ma nye bar ni //
T02TD1251E:223a-12: babs sam dad kyang de'i sbyor ba //
T02TD1251E:223a-13: mig tu 'bar bcas aom bsams la //
T02TD1251E:223a-14: he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1251E:223a-15: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1251E:223a-16: mig ni thams cad 'byed par mdzad //
T02TD1251E:223a-17: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD1251E:223a-18: de la bla mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1251E:223a-20: dad pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-21: khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes //
T02TD1251E:223a-22: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1251E:223a-23: sngon ma byung ba mthong ba'o //
T02TD1251E:223a-24: slob ma yon dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1251E:223a-25: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te //
T02TD1251E:223a-26: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-27: aom rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02TD1251E:223a-28: dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so /
T02TD1251E:223a-30: // aom rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02TD1251E:223a-31: dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong //
T02TD1251E:223a-32: aom gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02TD1251E:223a-33: dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur //
T02TD1251E:223a-34: de nas gtso bo nas brtsams nas //
T02TD1251E:223a-35: dkyil 'khor mtha' yi bar du bstan //
T02TD1251E:223a-36: dkyil 'khor shar du khru gnyis dor //
T02TD1251E:223a-37: nang gi dkyil 'khor phyed tshad tsam //
T02TD1251E:223a-38: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1251E:223a-39: dkyil 'khor de la khru do bar //
T02TD1251E:223a-40: dkyil 'khor gnyis par slob ma gzhag / mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sbyin //
T02TD1251E:223a-41: bag chags sbyang ba'i cho ga bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-42: slob ma shis par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1251E:223a-43: bla mas bkra shis glu blang bya //
T02TD1251E:223a-44: phun sum tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri bo lta bu'i mdog /'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs //
T02TD1251E:223a-45: sangs rgyas chu skyes 'dab rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD1251E:223a-46: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1251E:223a-47: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-0: dam chos rab mchog skye dgu rnams la @223b zhi byed pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-1: 'jig rten bkra shis gnyis pa deng 'dir khyod la shog / dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis phug //
T02TD1251E:223b-2: dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-3: ngo tsha dpal gnas tshogs kyi nang na rab kyi mchog /'jig rten bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog /
T02TD1251E:223b-4: dga' ldan lha yi gnas kyi dkyil nas 'gro don du //
T02TD1251E:223b-5: sngon gyi dus su brgya byin lha dang bcas pa yi //
T02TD1251E:223b-6: 'khor gyi tshogs bcas gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa'i //
T02TD1251E:223b-7: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / lum pa'i tshal du mgon po sku ni 'khrungs gyur cing //
T02TD1251E:223b-8: srid mthar mdzad che me tog ge sar bcas pa dag / rab 'bar 'bab pa lha mang gis mthong bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-9: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:223b-10: mtshan phyed dka' thub tshal du mngon par dgyes bcas pas //
T02TD1251E:223b-11: brgya byin ltar bcas rjes 'brang gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-12: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / chu bo'i 'gram du yon chab mar mes yongs bskor te //
T02TD1251E:223b-13: zhi phyir ngo mtshar rab bskyed srid pa dag byed pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-14: lto 'phye'i rgyal pos legs par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-15: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog //
T02TD1251E:223b-16: grong khyer rab mchog ser skya zhes ni bya ba der //
T02TD1251E:223b-17: lha chen khyab 'jug la sogs rnams kyis stong byed pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-18: bde gshegs thog mtha' med par dge ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-19: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /
T02TD1251E:223b-20: sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub pa //
T02TD1251E:223b-21: rin chen chos mdzod thub pa las ni gang byung ba //
T02TD1251E:223b-22: sems can don grub nus pa rgyas pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-23: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / gser gyi 'od ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba //
T02TD1251E:223b-24: bee d'u rya mdog 'dra ba'i rtsva bkram pa la bzhugs //
T02TD1251E:223b-25: skyil krung legs bcas mi g-yo'i sku mnga'i bkra shing gang //
T02TD1251E:223b-26: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / sa dang mkha' las sna tshogs dbye ba kun 'byung ba //
T02TD1251E:223b-27: byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi bde las rnam par rgyal //
T02TD1251E:224a-1: rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan bkra shis pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-2: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / b'a r'a na sir bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs ston pas //
T02TD1251E:224a-3: sa dang mkha' la shin tu ngo mtshar gsal byung ba'i //
T02TD1251E:224a-4: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab bskor bkra shis gang //
T02TD1251E:224a-5: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / bsod nams las byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon brten pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-6: bcom ldan sh'a kya seng ges ma lus gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1251E:224a-7: phan byed dam pa bzang po'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-8: bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog / dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor //
T02TD1251E:224a-9: glu dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so //
T02TD1251E:224a-10: gser la sogs pa'i stan gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-11: der ni de ni dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-12: slob ma nges par byed du gzhug / de bzhin de bzhin dbang bskur la //
T02TD1251E:224a-13: lha yi sbyor ba gang yin pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-15: dang po chu yi dbang yin te //
T02TD1251E:224a-16: gnyis pa dbu rgyan dbang yin no //
T02TD1251E:224a-17: gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin no //
T02TD1251E:224a-18: bzhi pa rang bzhin dbang yin te //
T02TD1251E:224a-19: lnga pa ming gi dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-20: drug pa yang dag sangs rgyas brjod //
T02TD1251E:224a-21: bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te //
T02TD1251E:224a-22: brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid do //
T02TD1251E:224a-23: dgu pa shes rab dbang gis te //
T02TD1251E:224a-24: de nyid rdo rje rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1251E:224a-25: brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-26: 'di dag rim par sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-27: rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus //
T02TD1251E:224a-28: bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis //
T02TD1251E:224a-29: rdo rje 'chang bsams dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-30: rdo rje thugs su bsgoms pas so //
T02TD1251E:224a-31: aom badzra aa bhi shi nytsa mi tvam /
T02TD1251E:224a-32: rdo rje nyi ma rnam bsams nas //
T02TD1251E:224a-33: de la dbu rgyan sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-34: aom badzra ratna ka badzra sha li ho //
T02TD1251E:224a-35: thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la //
T02TD1251E:224a-36: rdo rje'i tshigs bcad rab tu sbyor //
T02TD1251E:224a-37: rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa //
T02TD1251E:224a-38: rang gi lag pas snying gar bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-39: slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug gzugs //
T02TD1251E:224a-40: rdo rje sems zhes dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1251E:224a-41: sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni //
T02TD1251E:224a-42: di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1251E:224a-43: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1251E:224a-44: shin tu 'grub phyir rdo rje long //
T02TD1251E:224a-45: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi ba ti tv'am //
T02TD1251E:224b-0: aa bhi shi nytsa mi ta shthi b'i ra sa ma ya @224b stvam ;
T02TD1251E:224b-1: slob ma rta mchog bsam byas la //
T02TD1251E:224b-2: lta mo sgrol mas sku la 'khyud //
T02TD1251E:224b-3: rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1251E:224b-4: lag pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol //
T02TD1251E:224b-5: aom badzra dhi ba ti stvam /
T02TD1251E:224b-6: aa ghi sha nytsi mi ti shtha badzra sa ma ya st'am /
T02TD1251E:224b-7: slob ma rnam par snang mdzad bsam //
T02TD1251E:224b-8: ming gi dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD1251E:224b-9: aom badzra satva aa bhi shi nytsa mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1251E:224b-10: kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:224b-11: gang gang snang ba de kun dang //
T02TD1251E:224b-12: rang 'dod lha la sogs pa de //
T02TD1251E:224b-13: rang bzhin dag pa'i dri med chos //
T02TD1251E:224b-14: sangs rgyas ye shes blta bar bya //
T02TD1251E:224b-15: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1251E:224b-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1251E:224b-17: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02TD1251E:224b-18: rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1251E:224b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta si ddhi badzra sa ma ya ti shtha sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1251E:224b-20: dha ra y'a mi hi hi hi hi h'u% //
T02TD1251E:224b-21: bdag gis bcom ldan tshigs bcad ni //
T02TD1251E:224b-22: rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1251E:224b-23: bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gang tshe chos bstan pa //
T02TD1251E:224b-24: de tshe gsang ba'i dbang pos zhus //
T02TD1251E:224b-25: mi rnams ji ltar dbang bskur bgyi //
T02TD1251E:224b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1251E:224b-27: dgod pa dag la slob dpon te //
T02TD1251E:224b-28: de bzhin blta ba gsang ba'i dbang //
T02TD1251E:224b-29: lag pas reg pa shes rab ste //
T02TD1251E:224b-30: de nyid gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa yi //
T02TD1251E:224b-31: dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin no //
T02TD1251E:224b-32: bla ma'i zhal nas gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:224b-33: 'di ni dbang bskur drug yin no //
T02TD1251E:224b-34: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1251E:224b-37: slob ma bla ma la gsol gdab /
T02TD1251E:224b-38: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig / dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02TD1251E:224b-39: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dag / mgon pos bdag la bka' stsol cig / sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02TD1251E:224b-40: gsang ba'i sdom pa'i mchog rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:224b-41: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1251E:224b-42: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyi //
T02TD1251E:224b-43: de ltar slob mas gsol btab nas //
T02TD1251E:224b-44: bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin la //
T02TD1251E:224b-45: gnas nas de dbang bskur ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:224b-46: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya //
T02TD1251E:224b-47: nye 'khor ba dan rgyal mtshan sogs //
T02TD1251E:224b-48: glu dang rnga sogs sa ru ni //
T02TD1251E:225a-3: rin po che yi dbang 'di ni //
T02TD1251E:225a-4: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1251E:225a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD1251E:225a-6: gnas las byung ba nga yis sbyin //
T02TD1251E:225a-7: dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te //
T02TD1251E:225a-8: gnyis pa gsang pa'i dbang yin no //
T02TD1251E:225a-9: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
T02TD1251E:225a-10: bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1251E:225a-11: thams cad thabs kyi cho ga dang //
T02TD1251E:225a-12: bla med mchod pas mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:225a-13: de nas lag nas lag tu ni //
T02TD1251E:225a-14: slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin //
T02TD1251E:225a-15: sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med //
T02TD1251E:225a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1251E:225a-17: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1251E:225a-18: rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po bdag / shes rab pha rol phyin ma las //
T02TD1251E:225a-19: byung ba'i dril bu'ang de la sbyin //
T02TD1251E:225a-20: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1251E:225a-21: rdo rje dril bu'i ming nyid do //
T02TD1251E:225a-22: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1251E:225a-23: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bstan //
T02TD1251E:225a-24: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung //
T02TD1251E:225a-25: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02TD1251E:225a-26: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:225a-28: rdo rje che dang dril bu che //
T02TD1251E:225a-29: zung cig rdo rje rab gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:225a-30: deng khyod rdo rje slob dpon te //
T02TD1251E:225a-31: khyod kyis slob ma gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1251E:225a-32: mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1251E:225a-33: dam tshig lnga rnams yongs gang ba'i //
T02TD1251E:225a-34: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs dang ldan //
T02TD1251E:225a-35: slob ma rdo rje 'chang dbang bskur //
T02TD1251E:225a-37: yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te //
T02TD1251E:225a-38: gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste //
T02TD1251E:225a-39: sems ni gzhal med khang brtsegs 'phags //
T02TD1251E:225a-40: de yi phyi rol gru bzhi ste //
T02TD1251E:225a-41: tshad ma mnyam por gyur pa'o //
T02TD1251E:225a-42: byams pa la sogs sems ni gang //
T02TD1251E:225a-43: thig skud bzhir ni brjod pa'o //
T02TD1251E:225a-44: thig gdab yang dag gang bshad pa //
T02TD1251E:225a-45: chos kyi dran pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1251E:225a-46: lta ba thams cad rnam grol ba //
T02TD1251E:225a-47: ye shes thig skud dag tu brjod //
T02TD1251E:225a-48: rgyan rnams yang dag gang bshad pa //
T02TD1251E:225a-49: tshul khrims sogs kyi sdom pa mchog / dad dbang la sogs sems gnyis na //
T02TD1251E:225a-50: rva ba lngar ni byung ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:225a-51: gang zhig sgo zhes bshad pa ni //
T02TD1251E:225a-52: rnam thar bzhi yi dbye ba'o //
T02TD1251E:225b-0: rta babs ka ba bzhi @225b po na //
T02TD1251E:225b-1: yang dag spong ba bzhi zhes brjod //
T02TD1251E:225b-2: ya phubs bzhi po gang yin pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-3: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi //
T02TD1251E:225b-4: sgo khyud bzhi ni gang yin pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-5: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi zhes bya //
T02TD1251E:225b-6: me tog phreng bas brgyan byas pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-7: byang chub sems ni yan lag bdun //
T02TD1251E:225b-8: ka ba rnam pa brgyad po ni //
T02TD1251E:225b-9: 'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad //
T02TD1251E:225b-10: rnga yab ces ni gang grags pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-11: lam gyi bye brag ye shes brjod //
T02TD1251E:225b-12: dran par yang dag gang bshad pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-13: nyon mongs 'joms pas dra ba ste //
T02TD1251E:225b-14: yang dag 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyi'o //
T02TD1251E:225b-15: 'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-16: tshogs gnyis kyi ni rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1251E:225b-17: nyon mongs byed ni 'joms pas na //
T02TD1251E:225b-18: dra ba phyed par brjod pa'o //
T02TD1251E:225b-19: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1251E:225b-20: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
T02TD1251E:225b-21: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1251E:225b-22: rdo rje skye mched nges par ni //
T02TD1251E:225b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / sa ni spyan zhes kun du brjod //
T02TD1251E:225b-24: chu yi khams ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1251E:225b-25: gos dkar mo dang sgrol na ni //
T02TD1251E:225b-26: drod dang rlung du rab tu grags //
T02TD1251E:225b-27: gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas //
T02TD1251E:225b-28: gti mug zad pa gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1251E:225b-29: des na phung po mthar byed dang //
T02TD1251E:225b-30: de bzhin shes rab mthar byed pa'o //
T02TD1251E:225b-31: nyes pas nyes pa longs spyod pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-32: nyes zad shes rab mthar byed de //
T02TD1251E:225b-33: des na sems ni mthar byed dang //
T02TD1251E:225b-34: des na nyon mongs mthar byed yin //
T02TD1251E:225b-37: des na gsung gi mthar byed yin //
T02TD1251E:225b-38: de bzhin sbyor ba mthar byed do //
T02TD1251E:225b-39: nyon mongs thams cad zad pa dang //
T02TD1251E:225b-40: de bzhin las kun zad pa dang //
T02TD1251E:225b-41: sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni //
T02TD1251E:225b-42: bgegs ni mthar byed ces brjod do //
T02TD1251E:225b-43: 'di ni lha'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1251E:225b-44: phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo //
T02TD1251E:225b-45: de nas slob mas bla ma la //
T02TD1251E:225b-46: legs bslabs bzhin bzangs mig dkyus ring ;
T02TD1251E:225b-47: / gzugs dang lang tshos rgyan byas ma //
T02TD1251E:225b-48: phul la 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02TD1251E:225b-49: bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye //
T02TD1251E:225b-50: rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa //
T02TD1251E:225b-51: mi phyed phyag rgya rab sgrub byed //
T02TD1251E:225b-53: ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che //
T02TD1251E:226a-0: gtso bo bdag la yang de @226a * //
T02TD1251E:226a-3: bying ba skyabs med bdag skyob mdzod //
T02TD1251E:226a-4: mi bskyod sbyor ba btang byas te //
T02TD1251E:226a-5: rtag pa'i sbyor bas rjes dran bya //
T02TD1251E:226a-6: slob ma drung du gzhag byas la //
T02TD1251E:226a-7: de yi rjes su bla ma yis //
T02TD1251E:226a-8: gos la sogs pas mig bkab nas //
T02TD1251E:226a-9: brtags pa'i stan la gzhag par bya //
T02TD1251E:226a-10: shes rab ldan pa rab tu 'jug / rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1251E:226a-12: slob ma rtag par bsams byas la //
T02TD1251E:226a-13: 'dzag pa'i rigs zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1251E:226a-14: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1251E:226a-15: byang chub sems rnams dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD1251E:226a-16: nga yis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1251E:226a-17: rgyun gyis khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1251E:226a-18: zad med de ni zad dogs na //
T02TD1251E:226a-19: nya phyis la sogs zhen pa spangs //
T02TD1251E:226a-20: dag pa'i lce yi rtse mo yis //
T02TD1251E:226a-21: gnyis ka las byung blang bar bya //
T02TD1251E:226a-22: 'di ni de nyid bla na med //
T02TD1251E:226a-23: gnyis med ye shes brjod mi nus //
T02TD1251E:226a-24: chos dbyings rnam pa lta bur ni //
T02TD1251E:226a-25: zhi ba'i bde bas yang dag myang //
T02TD1251E:226a-26: g-yas pa mchog sbyin khu tshur gyis //
T02TD1251E:226a-27: snying gar chos gos grva nas gzung //
T02TD1251E:226a-28: lag pas dril bu mgul du bsdam //
T02TD1251E:226a-29: bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba yis //
T02TD1251E:226a-30: dbugs 'byung thams cad yang dag blangs //
T02TD1251E:226a-31: sh'a kya thub pa nyid gyur pas //
T02TD1251E:226a-32: slob ma chen po lung bstan byed //
T02TD1251E:226a-33: khyod ni sangs rgyas the tshom med //
T02TD1251E:226a-36: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1251E:226a-37: bu khyod nga yis lung bstan te //
T02TD1251E:226a-38: 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan khyod //
T02TD1251E:226a-39: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1251E:226a-40: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:226a-41: srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton //
T02TD1251E:226a-42: kye rang 'dod lha mi de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1251E:226a-44: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang las lung bstan pa'o //
T02TD1251E:226a-45: 'byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1251E:226a-46: chen po'i chen pos ji ltar byin //
T02TD1251E:226a-47: bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don du ni //
T02TD1251E:226a-48: nam mkha'i rdo rjes bdag la stsol //
T02TD1251E:226a-49: rig ma dang po 'am yang na gzhan //
T02TD1251E:226a-50: rgyud gzhan las gsungs rim pa yis //
T02TD1251E:226a-51: tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor sbyin //
T02TD1251E:226a-52: phyag rgya bzang mo rab brtags pa //
T02TD1251E:226b-0: lha mo thar byed @226b dga' ster ma //
T02TD1251E:226b-1: sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma //
T02TD1251E:226b-2: zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che //
T02TD1251E:226b-3: bzung par byas nas mchod par gyis //
T02TD1251E:226b-4: de nas chos dbyings rdo rje ma //
T02TD1251E:226b-5: dam tshig sdom pa 'di skad ston //
T02TD1251E:226b-6: nus sam khyod ci rdo rje can //
T02TD1251E:226b-7: dri chen dri chu bza' btung yin //
T02TD1251E:226b-8: rakta m'am sa ga bur dang //
T02TD1251E:226b-9: bud med mos par dad nus sam //
T02TD1251E:226b-10: bha ga 'o byed mi rtog gam //
T02TD1251E:226b-11: ltos shig rdo rje bde ba can //
T02TD1251E:226b-12: de nas de yis rdo rje can //
T02TD1251E:226b-13: rab tu dgod cing 'di skad smra //
T02TD1251E:226b-14: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi thig / ga bur m'am sa bdag 'tshal gyis //
T02TD1251E:226b-15: shes rab yang dag dad par bgyi //
T02TD1251E:226b-16: de nas lha mo gcer phyung nas //
T02TD1251E:226b-17: bdag nyid padma ltar gzhug go //
T02TD1251E:226b-18: rmad byung nga yi padma yin //
T02TD1251E:226b-19: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1251E:226b-20: rtag tu rim bzhin 'di la spyod //
T02TD1251E:226b-22: chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag / sems can khams ni rnam par grol //
T02TD1251E:226b-23: bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni //
T02TD1251E:226b-24: rang bzhin thams cad la mdun nas //
T02TD1251E:226b-25: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02TD1251E:226b-26: padma la bzhugs bar du gsungs //
T02TD1251E:226b-27: bha ga nang du nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1251E:226b-29: lte ba la ni ge sar bcas //
T02TD1251E:226b-30: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1251E:226b-31: der gnas nas ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:226b-32: mi 'chi lha yi gzugs su ni //
T02TD1251E:226b-34: shes rab kyis ni de ltar gsungs //
T02TD1251E:226b-35: badzra mo ksha ho: / de nas sngags pa rdo rje can //
T02TD1251E:226b-36: de yi rgyu yi sa dbang la //
T02TD1251E:226b-37: bha ga'i nang gi rtsa las ni //
T02TD1251E:226b-38: 'bad pa las ni rnyed pa la //
T02TD1251E:226b-39: bslab pa bla ma'i dam tshig gis //
T02TD1251E:226b-40: mdzub mos rab tu brud nas ni //
T02TD1251E:226b-41: lce yi yang yang rol mo mdzad //
T02TD1251E:226b-42: des ni rab tu rgyas par 'ong //
T02TD1251E:226b-43: de ltar rol mo mdzad tsam na //
T02TD1251E:226b-44: de bas kyang ni shin tu rgyas //
T02TD1251E:226b-45: rtag pa'i bde ba rab tu byung //
T02TD1251E:226b-46: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1251E:226b-47: stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:226b-48: sa bcu po ni las 'das pas //
T02TD1251E:226b-49: rdo rje mtshan mar de 'gyur ro //
T02TD1251E:226b-50: rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1251E:226b-51: rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1251E:226b-52: rdo rje sems ni des phyung nas //
T02TD1251E:226b-53: rdo rje lce yis bza' bar bya //
T02TD1251E:226b-54: mnyam par 'byung pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1251E:226b-55: dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-0: @227a * // ting 'dzin las skyes sbyin sreg ste //
T02TD1251E:227a-1: de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-2: gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1251E:227a-3: rab zhugs dam pa mthong ba yis //
T02TD1251E:227a-4: sdig pa kun las nges grol bar //
T02TD1251E:227a-5: deng khyod yang dag gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:227a-6: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1251E:227a-8: mi thub pa dang mi 'chi bas //
T02TD1251E:227a-9: sus kyang mi tshugs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD1251E:227a-10: srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:227a-11: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD1251E:227a-12: shin tu srid pa grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:227a-13: ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD1251E:227a-14: 'di ni khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung //
T02TD1251E:227a-15: grub pa'i dam tshig sdom pa'o //
T02TD1251E:227a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyam par gsungs //
T02TD1251E:227a-17: dam pa rtag pa'i bka' lung yin //
T02TD1251E:227a-18: slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:227a-19: bde gshegs bka' la 'gom mi bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-20: rdo rje spun la smad pa ni //
T02TD1251E:227a-21: nam yang smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1251E:227a-22: sems can rnams la byams dman min //
T02TD1251E:227a-23: skal min de kho na gtam min //
T02TD1251E:227a-24: skal ldan sems can spang mi bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-25: bdag gi lus 'di mi smad cing //
T02TD1251E:227a-26: dam pa'i chos ni tshad mi gzung //
T02TD1251E:227a-27: gzhan gyi chos la 'ang brnyas mi bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-28: byang chub snying po'i mthar thug tu //
T02TD1251E:227a-29: dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-30: rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-31: rdo rje dril bu gzung bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:227a-32: dbu rgyan rtag tu gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-33: rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-34: dkyil 'khor rtag tu bri ba ste //
T02TD1251E:227a-35: rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-36: 'byung po chen po'i gtor ma byin //
T02TD1251E:227a-37: de la sogs pa dbugs dbyung rgyas //
T02TD1251E:227a-38: shes rab kyi dbang la brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1251E:227a-39: ston pas gsungs pa sems dpa' che //
T02TD1251E:227a-40: yang dag dam par dga' thob pa //
T02TD1251E:227a-41: sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD1251E:227a-42: bde ba chen po gzung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227a-43: de ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02TD1251E:227a-44: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02TD1251E:227a-45: 'di ni dam pa'i bde chen te //
T02TD1251E:227a-46: gzhan med bdag kyang med pa'o //
T02TD1251E:227a-47: ye shes 'di ni ches phra ste //
T02TD1251E:227a-48: snying po rdo rje mkha' lta bu //
T02TD1251E:227a-49: rdul bral zhi ba thar pa ste //
T02TD1251E:227a-50: khyod rang yang ni pha de'o //
T02TD1251E:227a-51: 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste //
T02TD1251E:227b-0: thams cad lus la rnam par @227b gnas //
T02TD1251E:227b-1: gnyis su med dang gnyis kyi gzugs //
T02TD1251E:227b-2: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02TD1251E:227b-3: g-yo dang mi g-yo nges thob nas //
T02TD1251E:227b-4: sgyu ma'i gzugs dang mtshungs par sdang //
T02TD1251E:227b-6: rtag tu nges par 'gyur ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:227b-7: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi rjes la de skad brjod do //
T02TD1251E:227b-8: bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas ni //
T02TD1251E:227b-9: bzhi pa shes par bya ba yin //
T02TD1251E:227b-10: slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs rjes su //
T02TD1251E:227b-11: dkyil 'khor mchod bstod legs byas la //
T02TD1251E:227b-12: aom khyed gyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1251E:227b-13: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1251E:227b-14: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1251E:227b-15: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1251E:227b-16: brjod de lha yi 'khor lo gshegs //
T02TD1251E:227b-17: dman pa chu bo chen por dor //
T02TD1251E:227b-18: aom gi li gi li h'u% dza: sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:227b-19: rdul tshon bsdu ba dang dor ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1251E:227b-20: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las //
T02TD1251E:227b-21: slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'i rim pa ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD1251E:227b-23: // / de nas slob ldan rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1251E:227b-24: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas phyir //
T02TD1251E:227b-25: sa phyogs nyams dga' yid 'ong bar //
T02TD1251E:227b-26: dri zhim byug cing me tog dgram //
T02TD1251E:227b-27: bde ba'i stan la rab gnas la//
T02TD1251E:227b-28: pam pad ram skyes gzhom med las //
T02TD1251E:227b-29: lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1251E:227b-30: rgyal ba spyan drangs mkha' la bzhugs //
T02TD1251E:227b-31: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis //
T02TD1251E:227b-32: bla ma rdo rje mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:227b-33: bshags dang yi rang bsngo ba dang //
T02TD1251E:227b-34: skyabs 'gro mchog sems lam gnas bya //
T02TD1251E:227b-35: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02TD1251E:227b-36: btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02TD1251E:227b-37: gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsregs la //
T02TD1251E:227b-38: bram ze rgyal rigs sogs gnas bya //
T02TD1251E:227b-39: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a a'a tma ko& ham //
T02TD1251E:227b-40: pam pad re pha gsal byed de //
T02TD1251E:227b-41: sna tshogs rdo rje h'u% de las //
T02TD1251E:227b-42: ra ba bla re gur nang du //
T02TD1251E:227b-43: khro bo bcus kyang bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:227b-44: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:227b-45: nam mkhar yam ram bam lam las //
T02TD1251E:227b-46: rlung me chu sa dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1251E:227b-47: bh'um las 'khor lo de steng du //
T02TD1251E:227b-48: srid pa bar ma'i bag chags bsam //
T02TD1251E:227b-49: de dag las gyur pho brang ni //
T02TD1251E:228a-2: dra ba dra phyed ka ba brgyad //
T02TD1251E:228a-3: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1251E:228a-4: der ni mtsho skyes snang byed kyi //
T02TD1251E:228a-5: steng du bdud bzhi'i gdan bsam mo //
T02TD1251E:228a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ni la ya badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham //
T02TD1251E:228a-7: a'a li zla ba me long dang //
T02TD1251E:228a-8: k'a li nyi ma mnyam nyid ldan //
T02TD1251E:228a-9: aom h'u% rdo rje gri gug dang //
T02TD1251E:228a-10: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te //
T02TD1251E:228a-11: thams cad gcig gyur bya nan tan //
T02TD1251E:228a-12: gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa chos dbyings so //
T02TD1251E:228a-13: de las byung bas kun du bzang //
T02TD1251E:228a-14: zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi bcu drug phyag / rtsa zhal zla 'dra g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1251E:228a-15: sngon po dmar po lhag ma gnag //
T02TD1251E:228a-16: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02TD1251E:228a-17: skyes pa seng ge byi la g-yas //
T02TD1251E:228a-18: sa chu rlung me zla nyi dang //
T02TD1251E:228a-19: mthar byed nor sbyin g-yon na'o //
T02TD1251E:228a-20: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis gnag / gri gug thod pa g-yas g-yon na'o //
T02TD1251E:228a-21: aom padma su kha dhar ma h'a ra kha su kham da dha tsa tu ra /
T02TD1251E:228a-22: a'a nan da bha ga bi sva h'u% h'u% h'u% k'a ryam ku ru sha me /
T02TD1251E:228a-23: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu ra a'a nan da d'a ya /
T02TD1251E:228a-24: ka kha ga mu kha ae ka ra so n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u% ka ryam ku ru shva me /
T02TD1251E:228a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:228a-26: gnyis gnyis sgras bskul sa bon las //
T02TD1251E:228a-27: gzugs sgra dri ro'i rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1251E:228a-28: sa chu me rlung rnam dag pa //
T02TD1251E:228a-29: lha mo brgyad rnams rim pas bkod //
T02TD1251E:228a-30: dbang po tshangs steng goo ri gnag / phyag gnyis gri gug ro hi ta //
T02TD1251E:228a-31: gshin rjer rkun ma dbang po'i steng //
T02TD1251E:228a-32: dmar po cang te'u phag pa can //
T02TD1251E:228a-33: chu bdag nye dbang ro langs ma //
T02TD1251E:228a-34: dmar ser rus sbal thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1251E:228a-35: lus ngan drag por za phod mo //
T02TD1251E:228a-36: ljang gu sbrul dang pad snod can //
T02TD1251E:228a-37: dbang ldan gshin rje pukka s'i //
T02TD1251E:228a-38: dbang sngon ser g-yas dgra sta g-yon //
T02TD1251E:228a-39: byin zar ri khrod nor sbyin steng //
T02TD1251E:228a-41: bden bral de steng gtum mo sngo //
T02TD1251E:228a-42: g-yas na 'khor lo thod pa g-yon //
T02TD1251E:228a-43: rlung mtshams g-yung mi lha min te //
T02TD1251E:228a-44: rdo rje sdigs mdzub sna tshogs mdog / yang na sbyor sgras aom a'a: h'u%/
T02TD1251E:228a-45: ho: gnyis dbus gnas sbyor pa yis //
T02TD1251E:228a-46: rig ma dang bcas zhu ba las //
T02TD1251E:228a-47: pukka s'i sogs glu yis bskul //
T02TD1251E:228a-48: snying rje'i thugs kyis rje btsun bzhengs //
T02TD1251E:228b-0: pukka @228b s'i bdag skyabs mdzod cig / stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni //
T02TD1251E:228b-1: bdag la bde chen rnal 'byor mdzod //
T02TD1251E:228b-2: khyod dang bral na bdag 'gum mo //
T02TD1251E:228b-3: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs mdzod la //
T02TD1251E:228b-4: ri khrod ma ni bdag don sgrubs //
T02TD1251E:228b-6: stong pa nyid la ci phyir bzhugs //
T02TD1251E:228b-7: gtum mo bdag ni zhu bar bgyid //
T02TD1251E:228b-9: bdag gis nyid kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02TD1251E:228b-10: dbang po'i dri ldan khyod bzhengs shig / g-yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas //
T02TD1251E:228b-11: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / bskul bas smon lam rjes dran nas //
T02TD1251E:228b-12: h'u% dang ao% las rab bzhengs pa //
T02TD1251E:228b-13: rnam thar bsdu dngos stong rnams dag / zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi bcu drug phyag / g-yas kar g-yon dmar dbus mthing spyan //
T02TD1251E:228b-14: gsum gsum lhag ma bung ba mtshungs //
T02TD1251E:228b-15: nyi mar zhabs g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum //
T02TD1251E:228b-16: lhag mar gar gyi tshul gyis bzhengs //
T02TD1251E:228b-17: g-yas par glang sogs nad rnams sdud //
T02TD1251E:228b-18: g-yon pas sa sogs dbang phyug brgyad //
T02TD1251E:228b-19: thod pa skam rlon do shal thod //
T02TD1251E:228b-20: phyag rgya lngas brgyan bdud bzhi mnan //
T02TD1251E:228b-21: rnam shes dag pa bdag med gnag / g-yas na gri gug thod pa g-yon //
T02TD1251E:228b-22: skra ser spyan gsum rgyan rnams rdzogs //
T02TD1251E:228b-23: yab yum 'khor bcas thugs kar ni //
T02TD1251E:228b-24: pad nyir sa bon phyag mtshan las //
T02TD1251E:228b-25: ye shes sems dpa' bskyed par bya //
T02TD1251E:228b-27: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bya //
T02TD1251E:228b-28: g'oo r'i la sogs lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1251E:228b-29: dgug gzhug bcing dang dgyes pa bskyed //
T02TD1251E:228b-30: aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzra tsoo r'i pra be sha h'u%/
T02TD1251E:228b-31: aom badzra be t'a l'i spho ta ya bam /
T02TD1251E:228b-32: aom badzra gha sma r'i ba shim ku ru ho: / mig dang rna ba sna lce lus //
T02TD1251E:228b-33: yid kyi skye mched rnam dag pa //
T02TD1251E:228b-34: gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang //
T02TD1251E:228b-35: 'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02TD1251E:228b-36: bdag med ma rnams rang gnas dgod //
T02TD1251E:228b-37: lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa //
T02TD1251E:228b-38: mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og ma //
T02TD1251E:228b-39: sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su'o //
T02TD1251E:228b-40: 'od zer gyis bskul dpa' bo'i tshogs //
T02TD1251E:228b-41: mchod byas gsol btab dbang bskur mtha' //
T02TD1251E:229a-2: zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang //
T02TD1251E:229a-3: 'dod chags rdo rje goo r'i sogs //
T02TD1251E:229a-4: gnyis gnyis rim bzhin phyag rgyas gdab //
T02TD1251E:229a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:229a-6: rlung me'i steng du thod par ni //
T02TD1251E:229a-7: bhum aam dzrim kham h'u% dang ni //
T02TD1251E:229a-8: go ku da ha na las ni //
T02TD1251E:229a-9: bdud rtsi rdo rje lce yis myang //
T02TD1251E:229a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta sva da na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:229a-11: de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs spros pas //
T02TD1251E:229a-12: zla nyi chus smin rdo rje ro //
T02TD1251E:229a-13: cang te'u sgra dang 'khyud pa ste //
T02TD1251E:229a-14: gtso bo nas brtsams rim bzhin mchod //
T02TD1251E:229a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:229a-16: 'gro ba dug can mi bzad pas //
T02TD1251E:229a-17: khyab par bzhugs nas he ru kas //
T02TD1251E:229a-18: sna tshogs tshul gyis bdud rtsir bsgyur //
T02TD1251E:229a-19: sman mchog dpa' bo khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1251E:229a-20: aom sarba t'a th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:229a-21: de ltar bde bar gshegs drug gis //
T02TD1251E:229a-22: bsam gtan rab tu 'bad pas bya //
T02TD1251E:229a-23: bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang //
T02TD1251E:229a-24: de ni dag pa rjes su dran //
T02TD1251E:229a-25: de nas mkhas pas sngags bzlas te //
T02TD1251E:229a-26: yab yum zhal nas mgal me yi //
T02TD1251E:229a-27: 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya //
T02TD1251E:229a-28: kha dog las kyi dbye bas dbye //
T02TD1251E:229a-30: pim go ra dhva ke sha wartma ne /
T02TD1251E:229a-31: tsa tur bim sha ti nee tr'a ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-32: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-33: krishna dz'i mu ta wa pu she /
T02TD1251E:229a-34: ka p'a la m'a ne ka dha ri ne /
T02TD1251E:229a-35: a'a dhma ta kr'u ra tsi tt'a ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-36: aa rdha ndu dam shti ne /
T02TD1251E:229a-37: aom m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-38: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-39: ga rdza ya ga rdza ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-40: ta rdza ya ta rdza ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-41: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02TD1251E:229a-42: sa pta s'a ga r'a na /
T02TD1251E:229a-44: n'a ga aa shta ka n'a /
T02TD1251E:229a-47: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:229a-48: rdo rje'i glu dang smon lam dang //
T02TD1251E:229a-49: langs nas dngos grub lhar bsam spyad //
T02TD1251E:229a-50: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bya ba ste drug pa'o /
T02TD1251E:229a-52: // / bskyed pas blo sbyangs rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1251E:229a-53: rdzogs pa'i rim la gnas pas bya //
T02TD1251E:229a-54: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02TD1251E:229a-55: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs nas //
T02TD1251E:229a-56: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
T02TD1251E:229a-57: bsregs pas ham las ri bong 'dzag / sgong skyes gnas su chu skyes ni //
T02TD1251E:229b-0: @229b 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas de la //
T02TD1251E:229b-1: yab lnga yum bzhi kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1251E:229b-2: kun nas mi 'chi rgyun gyis mchod //
T02TD1251E:229b-3: snying dbus zla bar gzhom med ni //
T02TD1251E:229b-4: sna tshogs 'od ldan de rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:229b-5: rdo rje bdag med mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1251E:229b-6: cho gas bskul ba bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:229b-7: mkha' 'gro sna rtser yungs kar tsam //
T02TD1251E:229b-8: mchog dga'i tshul du thams cad bsdu //
T02TD1251E:229b-9: rang 'dod lha yi rim rdzogs nas //
T02TD1251E:229b-10: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer las //
T02TD1251E:229b-11: a'a li k'a li'i dkyil 'khor dag / spros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag / gnyis gnyis sgra yis rim bzhin du //
T02TD1251E:229b-12: lhan cig skyes pa'i nyi zlar gyur //
T02TD1251E:229b-13: 'od zer bye ba brgya stong nas //
T02TD1251E:229b-14: ma lus bzhugs pas byin gyis rlob //
T02TD1251E:229b-15: de nas bla nyi nyi rang la //
T02TD1251E:229b-16: zer yang spu rtsa de 'bum cha //
T02TD1251E:229b-17: 'bum cha'ang mi dmigs tshul de nyid //
T02TD1251E:229b-18: dga' ba chen po bsgom par bya //
T02TD1251E:229b-19: rdor dril yid 'ong mtshan ldan pa //
T02TD1251E:229b-20: g-yas kyis gsor zhing g-yon gyis dkrol //
T02TD1251E:229b-21: bcu drug cha la yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1251E:229b-22: thams cad thams cad bdag nyid la //
T02TD1251E:229b-23: chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa dang //
T02TD1251E:229b-24: mar me rgyun du 'bar ba ltar //
T02TD1251E:229b-25: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1251E:229b-26: nyin dang mtshan du gnas par bya //
T02TD1251E:229b-28: der ni sa ni skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:229b-29: gsher ba'i rnam pa byang chub sems //
T02TD1251E:229b-31: bsrubs pas me ni skye ba ste //
T02TD1251E:229b-32: 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags //
T02TD1251E:229b-33: bde ba nam mkha' yi ni khams //
T02TD1251E:229b-34: gang phyir 'byung chen bde ba yis //
T02TD1251E:229b-35: lnga rnams yongs su bskor ba ste //
T02TD1251E:229b-36: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
T02TD1251E:229b-37: lha gcig skyes gnyis gang skyes pa //
T02TD1251E:229b-38: de ni lhan skyes zhes su brjod //
T02TD1251E:229b-39: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes bya //
T02TD1251E:229b-40: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig / thugs rje thabs yin rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD1251E:229b-41: phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:229b-42: snying rje stong pa tha dad med //
T02TD1251E:229b-43: 'di ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //
T02TD1251E:229b-44: sngags 'dzab dka' thub sbyin sreg byed //
T02TD1251E:229b-46: sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg de //
T02TD1251E:229b-48: mdo ru bsdus na sems nyid de //
T02TD1251E:230a-2: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD1251E:230a-3: nye bar thob par gyur pa'i rtags //
T02TD1251E:230a-4: dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste //
T02TD1251E:230a-5: gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:230a-6: gsum pa me khyer rnam pa dang //
T02TD1251E:230a-7: bzhi pa mar me nye 'bar ba //
T02TD1251E:230a-8: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste //
T02TD1251E:230a-9: sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid //
T02TD1251E:230a-10: phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar //
T02TD1251E:230a-11: rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:230a-12: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02TD1251E:230a-13: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02TD1251E:230a-14: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las /
T02TD1251E:230a-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bya ba ste bdun pa'o /
T02TD1251E:230a-17: // / mkhas pa sngags kyi mthar phyin cing //
T02TD1251E:230a-18: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pas //
T02TD1251E:230a-20: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya //
T02TD1251E:230a-21: lus bkrus dris bsgom gos gtsang bgos //
T02TD1251E:230a-22: do shal rkang gdub dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD1251E:230a-23: rna cha gdu bu sor gdub sogs //
T02TD1251E:230a-24: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byas te //
T02TD1251E:230a-25: zla ba dag dang tshes grangs dang //
T02TD1251E:230a-26: gza' dang skar ma bzang po la //
T02TD1251E:230a-28: skyon spangs rnam mdzes bla gab can //
T02TD1251E:230a-29: ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim byugs //
T02TD1251E:230a-30: me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram //
T02TD1251E:230a-31: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs //
T02TD1251E:230a-32: bla re mchog ni bre bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:230a-33: bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1251E:230a-34: bum pa rin chen sogs gang dang //
T02TD1251E:230a-35: pi wang gling bu 'khar rnga sogs //
T02TD1251E:230a-36: glu gar dga' ston cher bya'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:230a-37: ci 'byor mchod pa legs bshams nas //
T02TD1251E:230a-38: gong ma'i cho gas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:230a-39: de nas gtor ma legs byin nas //
T02TD1251E:230a-40: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma gang //
T02TD1251E:230a-41: sku gzugs glegs bam mchod rten sogs //
T02TD1251E:230a-42: dang po nyes pa bkru ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:230a-43: ba yi lci ba chu dang zho //
T02TD1251E:230a-45: 'bru mar gyis kyang byug par bya //
T02TD1251E:230a-46: 'bru mar shun lpags lngas bsal bya'o //
T02TD1251E:230a-47: au dum b'a ra shi ri sha //
T02TD1251E:230a-48: aa shva ttha dang n+ya gro dha //
T02TD1251E:230a-49: bar ka ta yi shun pags te //
T02TD1251E:230a-50: de nas dri lngas khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1251E:230a-51: tsandan gnyis dang gur gum dang //
T02TD1251E:230a-52: la gu dran ti ka lnga'o //
T02TD1251E:230a-53: phyi dro sku gzugs 'du byas pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-1: lhag par gnas bya bum pa yang //
T02TD1251E:230b-2: snga ma'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
T02TD1251E:230b-3: lha gnas phyogs char khrus sa ni //
T02TD1251E:230b-4: zur bzhi khru bzhi khru do dpangs //
T02TD1251E:230b-5: yid 'ong mdzes bcas gdan steng bzhugs //
T02TD1251E:230b-6: bkra shis rol mor bcas khyus gsol //
T02TD1251E:230b-7: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1251E:230b-8: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1251E:230b-9: lha yi chu ni dag pa de //
T02TD1251E:230b-10: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD1251E:230b-11: khyod ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-12: ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-13: gtong ba dri yis rjes bsgos pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-15: khyod ni tshul khrims rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-16: khrims 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-17: tshul khrims dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-19: khyod ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-20: zhe sdang dri ma spyod mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-21: byams pa'i dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-23: khyod ni brtson 'grus rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-24: le lo'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-25: brtson 'grus dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-27: khyod ni bsam gtan rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-28: rnam g-yeng dri ma sbyong mdzad cing//
T02TD1251E:230b-29: ting 'dzin dri yis legs bsgos pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-31: khyod ni shes rab rang bzhin chus //
T02TD1251E:230b-32: shes 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-33: ye shes dri yis legs bsgos la //
T02TD1251E:230b-35: chu bo drug gis khrus mdzad cing //
T02TD1251E:230b-36: dri ma rnam drug sbyong mdzad pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-37: rgya chen yon tan drug ldan pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-38: khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:230b-39: gang la nyes pa mi mnga' zhing //
T02TD1251E:230b-40: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02TD1251E:230b-41: sangs rgyas de la thar don du //
T02TD1251E:230b-42: dad pas bdag ni khrus gsol lo //
T02TD1251E:230b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi shodha ne sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:230b-45: aom h'u% tr'am hr'i: mar khu'o //
T02TD1251E:230b-46: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka te sa ma ya shr'i ye a'a: h'u% sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:230b-47: sku khrus gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1251E:230b-48: de nas mkhas pas bkra shis kyi //
T02TD1251E:230b-49: tshigs bcad 'di yang brjod par bya //
T02TD1251E:230b-50: nyin mo bkra shis mtshan bkra shis //
T02TD1251E:231a-2: nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shis pa //
T02TD1251E:231a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-4: nyin mo bkra shis mtshan bkra shis //
T02TD1251E:231a-5: nyi ma'i gung la gnas bkra shis //
T02TD1251E:231a-6: nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shis pa //
T02TD1251E:231a-7: dam chos rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-10: rgyal sras rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-11: phyogs skyong rnams kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-12: srung ma'i tshogs kyis deng 'dir stsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-13: de ltar khrus gsol de 'og tu //
T02TD1251E:231a-14: gos kyi phyi bzhin dri lngas byug / sku la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1251E:231a-15: bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1251E:231a-16: de nas sku sogs mi dmigs la //
T02TD1251E:231a-17: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1251E:231a-18: de la sku sogs rdzogs pa la //
T02TD1251E:231a-19: spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02TD1251E:231a-20: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dag / dga' ldan du ni gnas nas su //
T02TD1251E:231a-21: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums gshegs pa //
T02TD1251E:231a-22: de bzhin 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-23: aom badzra goo r'i a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzro tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD1251E:231a-24: aom badzra be t'a l'i bandha bam /
T02TD1251E:231a-25: aom badzra gha sma r'i wa sham ku ru ho: /'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs nas kyang //
T02TD1251E:231a-26: brtse bas rjes su gzung ba dang //
T02TD1251E:231a-27: byang chub sems ni rab 'phel phyir //
T02TD1251E:231a-28: brtan par 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:231a-29: aom badzra dha ra dha ra /
T02TD1251E:231a-30: dha ra ya dha ra ya /
T02TD1251E:231a-32: badzra dhri ga aa dham ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-33: aom sa shva pa ra ma sa shva ta /
T02TD1251E:231a-34: ae hye hi dzi na dzi ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-35: aom badzra s'u rya ta mo bi dha ma na sa ma ya stvam ham ratna dhi ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-36: aom badzra dharm'a sa ma ya stvam hu lu hu lu a'a ro li ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-37: phu: phu: phu: hi hi hi /
T02TD1251E:231a-38: pra dzny'a dhi ka aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-39: aom mo ha ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-40: aom dve sha ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-41: aom r'a ga ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-42: aom badzra ra ti aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:231a-43: de nas mig sogs gti mug sogs //
T02TD1251E:231a-44: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02TD1251E:231a-45: dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis //
T02TD1251E:231a-46: rang nyid gnas su ye shes bsam //
T02TD1251E:231a-47: ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1251E:231a-48: mchod pa'i rim pa dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:231a-50: rgya cher rab tu mchod nas ni //
T02TD1251E:231a-51: blo dang ldan pas bstod pa bya //
T02TD1251E:231a-52: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che//
T02TD1251E:231b-0: @231b rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02TD1251E:231b-1: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1251E:231b-2: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1251E:231b-3: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02TD1251E:231b-4: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02TD1251E:231b-5: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:231b-6: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1251E:231b-7: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1251E:231b-8: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med //
T02TD1251E:231b-9: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:231b-10: rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che //
T02TD1251E:231b-11: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1251E:231b-12: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02TD1251E:231b-13: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:231b-14: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1251E:231b-15: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02TD1251E:231b-16: rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung //
T02TD1251E:231b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1251E:231b-18: der ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1251E:231b-19: sbyin sreg gtor ma'ang rgyas par bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-20: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu dag / phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1251E:231b-21: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las rab tu gnas pa'i bya ba ste brgyad pa'o /
T02TD1251E:231b-23: // / blo ldan khrus byas rgyan rnams brgyan //
T02TD1251E:231b-24: dkyil 'khor bsgrub dus gnas nang du //
T02TD1251E:231b-25: sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas te //
T02TD1251E:231b-26: las kun sgrub byed sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-27: sngags pas byang du mngon bltas te //
T02TD1251E:231b-28: zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1251E:231b-29: shar du rgyas pa mngon spyod lhor //
T02TD1251E:231b-30: dbang dang dgug pa nub tu'o //
T02TD1251E:231b-31: zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-32: rgyas pa nang par bya ba yin //
T02TD1251E:231b-33: dbang dang dgug pa nyi phyed la //
T02TD1251E:231b-34: mtshan phyed gsad dang zhe sdang ngo //
T02TD1251E:231b-35: phan pa gnyis kyis zhi ba ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-36: rdo rje nyi ma rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1251E:231b-37: rdo rje chos kyi dbang zhes bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' gsad pa'o //
T02TD1251E:231b-39: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-40: nad la sogs pa zhi bar bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-41: rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-42: rin chen char sprin rab bskor bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-43: rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1251E:231b-44: dgug pa'i las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1251E:231b-45: gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad pa ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-46: me yi char sprin dbab par bya //
T02TD1251E:231b-47: zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po ste //
T02TD1251E:231b-48: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o //
T02TD1251E:231b-49: dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra //
T02TD1251E:231b-50: dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs //
T02TD1251E:231b-51: gsad dang zhe sdang las la ni //
T02TD1251E:232a-2: khru gang pa dang khru phyed par //
T02TD1251E:232a-3: rgya dang zabs ni zhi ba ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-4: khru do pa dang khru gang pa //
T02TD1251E:232a-5: rgya dang zabs ni rgyas pa yin //
T02TD1251E:232a-6: dbang dang dgug pa'ang khru gang pa //
T02TD1251E:232a-7: khru phyed rgya dang zabs su bstan //
T02TD1251E:232a-8: sor mo nyi shu de yi phyed //
T02TD1251E:232a-9: rgya zabs gsad dang zhe sdang la'o //
T02TD1251E:232a-10: zhi ba'i kha khyer sor bzhi ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-11: rgyas pa la ni sor mo brgyad //
T02TD1251E:232a-12: dbang dang dgug la sor bzhi bzhi //
T02TD1251E:232a-13: gsad dang sdang la sor gsum gsum //
T02TD1251E:232a-14: phyed ma dkar pos zhi ba la //
T02TD1251E:232a-15: de bzhin rgyas pa ser po ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-16: dbang dang dgug la dmar por grags //
T02TD1251E:232a-17: gsod dang zhe sdang nag po'o //
T02TD1251E:232a-19: ral gri rdo rje ci rigs dgod //
T02TD1251E:232a-21: las kun pa yi sbyin sreg ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-22: tshad dang dbyibs dang kha dog dag / zhi ba dang mthun shar blta'o //

T02TD1251E:232a-28: ska rags gru bzhi mdzes pa ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-30: rin chen sor gnyis yu ba'i mgor //
T02TD1251E:232a-31: tha mar rdo rje sor drug pa //

T02TD1251E:232a-33: blugs gzar yu ba khru gang ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-34: mchur ni sor drug zheng dang zabs //
T02TD1251E:232a-35: rdo rje sor gsum pad 'dab mtshungs //

T02TD1251E:232a-40: de yi dgang gzar rgyar sor bzhi //
T02TD1251E:232a-41: zabs su sor bzhi nang rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:232a-42: sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste //
T02TD1251E:232a-44: blugs gzar pad dbyibs sor gnyis te //
T02TD1251E:232a-45: zabs su sor gcig nang rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:232a-46: dgang gzar blugs gzar kha rang gi //
T02TD1251E:232a-47: lha yi sa bon rab 'bar bsam //
T02TD1251E:232a-48: ri pha'ang de yi khar dgod bya //
T02TD1251E:232a-49: yang na sor mo lnga dang gsum //
T02TD1251E:232a-50: bcer bas kyang ni bya bar gsungs //
T02TD1251E:232a-51: me tog bdug spos mar me dang //

T02TD1251E:232a-53: g-yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod //
T02TD1251E:232a-54: mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD1251E:232b-0: @232b mchod sbyin shing sogs yal ga las //

T02TD1251E:232b-4: rgyas pa la ni sor bcu bzhi //
T02TD1251E:232b-5: zhi ba sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD1251E:232b-6: dbang la sor bcu sdang ba dang //
T02TD1251E:232b-7: gsad pa la yang sor mo brgyad //
T02TD1251E:232b-8: sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga //

T02TD1251E:232b-11: 'bras bu rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya //

T02TD1251E:232b-16: yid kyis mar khu bsam pa dang //
T02TD1251E:232b-18: 'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni //

T02TD1251E:232b-20: d'ur ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid //
T02TD1251E:232b-21: bsam gtan rdo rjes sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1251E:232b-22: me tog la sogs rdzas rnams ni //

T02TD1251E:232b-24: dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod //
T02TD1251E:232b-25: ser po rgyas pa sgrub thabs la //

T02TD1251E:232b-27: tha ma'i las la nag po'o //
T02TD1251E:232b-28: til gyi zhi ba rgyas pa zho //
T02TD1251E:232b-29: tsher mas de bzhin gsad pa la //

T02TD1251E:232b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil sngags yungs kar bzla //
T02TD1251E:232b-33: khu tshur gnyis kyis 'dod lha la //

T02TD1251E:232b-36: cig car khu tshur gnyis dag gis //
T02TD1251E:232b-37: g-yas su bskor bar yang bya'o //

T02TD1251E:233a-0: @233a * // sbyin sreg yan lag las byung zhing //

T02TD1251E:234a-9: bsang gtor bya ste me lha yi //

T02TD1251E:234a-34: tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster //
