T02TD1251E:235a-15: snga bar dge 'dun chos ston bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-16: bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-17: bla ma la ni yon dbul bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-18: de yi rjes la tshogs kun la'o //
T02TD1251E:235a-20: dbyug sngon can la gsol btab nas //
T02TD1251E:235a-21: skal ldan skal min shes 'gyur bas //
T02TD1251E:235a-22: dang por lung dang ngag gi brda //
T02TD1251E:235a-23: lung gis 'dir ni shes par bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-24: gang zhig spun dang sring mo yang //
T02TD1251E:235a-25: the tshom med par rnam par shes //
T02TD1251E:235a-26: gang gis sor mo gcig ston pa //
T02TD1251E:235a-28: gnyis ni legs par 'ongs pa yin //
T02TD1251E:235a-29: mthe bong g-yon pa bcangs pa ni //
T02TD1251E:235a-30: bde ba'i phyag rgyar shes par bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-31: gang zhig ming med ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-32: de yis mthe chung sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-33: gang zhig dbus ma ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-34: de yis mdzub mo sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-35: gang zhig ming med ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-36: de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-37: gang zhig gos ni ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-38: de la rtse gsum rab bstan bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-39: gang zhig nu ma ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-40: de la mtshams ni rab bstan bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-41: gang zhig sa ni ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-42: de la 'khor lo rab tu bstan //
T02TD1251E:235a-43: gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-44: gtsug phud dgrol bar ma mngon par brjod //
T02TD1251E:235a-45: gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-46: de la rgyab ni rab bstan bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-47: gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la //
T02TD1251E:235a-48: pho long rtse bar rol par bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-49: phyag rgya so so'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1251E:235a-50: dam tshig la yang dbye bar bya //
T02TD1251E:235a-51: de tshe rnal 'byor mas smras pa //
T02TD1251E:235a-52: ae ma bu ni snying rje che //
T02TD1251E:235a-53: gal te phreng ba'i lag ston na //
T02TD1251E:235a-54: 'du bar bya zhes brjod pa yin //
T02TD1251E:235b-0: phreng bas @235b mngon par gshegs byas la //
T02TD1251E:235b-1: dam tshig brtul zhugs shin tu mnos //
T02TD1251E:235b-2: ma da na chang ba la sha //
T02TD1251E:235b-3: ma la ya dza de bzhin du //
T02TD1251E:235b-4: 'gro ba khe ta ro shra pa //
T02TD1251E:235b-5: rus pa'i rgyan ni ni rang shu //
T02TD1251E:235b-6: bre kha na shog ces rab can //
T02TD1251E:235b-7: kri bi ta ni cang te'u 'dod //
T02TD1251E:235b-8: du dur ni skal med brjod //
T02TD1251E:235b-9: skal ldan ka lim dza ram 'dod //
T02TD1251E:235b-10: reg min di na ni mam zhes bya //
T02TD1251E:235b-11: thod pa padma ban dza nam //
T02TD1251E:235b-12: zan ni tri pi tri ka ram //
T02TD1251E:235b-13: tshod ma ma la ti dam nam //
T02TD1251E:235b-14: bshang ba tsa tur sa mam brjod //
T02TD1251E:235b-16: sihla rang byung shes par bya //
T02TD1251E:235b-17: ka bu ra ni khu bar shes //
T02TD1251E:235b-18: sha chen sha li dza zhes brjod //
T02TD1251E:235b-19: dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru //
T02TD1251E:235b-20: bo la rdo rje bshad pa ste //
T02TD1251E:235b-22: rigs kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1251E:235b-23: rigs ni rnam pa lnga zhes bshad //
T02TD1251E:235b-24: brda yi skad ni 'di dag la //
T02TD1251E:235b-25: sangs rgyas zhes bya rigs lnga yin //
T02TD1251E:235b-26: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad //
T02TD1251E:235b-28: rin chen rigs nyid rang 'tshed ma //
T02TD1251E:235b-29: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs mar shes //
T02TD1251E:235b-30: las kyi rigs nyid rang 'tshed ma //
T02TD1251E:235b-31: phyag rgya 'di dag dngos grub ster //
T02TD1251E:235b-32: de yi khu ba rdo rje yin //
T02TD1251E:235b-33: mchod byas brtul zhugs can gyis btud //
T02TD1251E:235b-34: rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che //
T02TD1251E:235b-35: khyod la nga yis bshad pa gang //
T02TD1251E:235b-36: rmad du byung ba brda yi tshig / de dag thams cad dad pas gzung //
T02TD1251E:235b-37: kye rdo rje las dbang bskur gang //
T02TD1251E:235b-38: brda yi skad ni mi smra na //
T02TD1251E:235b-39: de yi dam tshig nyams par ni //
T02TD1251E:235b-41: yams dang 'tshe ba rkun ma dang //
T02TD1251E:235b-42: gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyang //
T02TD1251E:235b-43: brda yi skad ni mi smra na //
T02TD1251E:235b-44: gal te sangs rgyas yin yang 'chi //
T02TD1251E:235b-45: rang gi dam tshig shes snyed la //
T02TD1251E:235b-46: gal te tshig 'di mi smra na //
T02TD1251E:235b-47: de la gnas bzhir skyes pa yis //
T02TD1251E:235b-48: rnal 'byor ma ni khro bar byed //
T02TD1251E:235b-49: sgrub dus bkra shis dga' ston dang //
T02TD1251E:235b-50: dam tshig gso pa'i cho ga sogs //
T02TD1251E:235b-51: yi dags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang //
T02TD1251E:235b-52: tshes brgyad kyi ni dus dag la //
T02TD1251E:235b-53: dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs dang //
T02TD1251E:235b-54: de bzhin mi ma yin gyi gnas //
T02TD1251E:235b-55: yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mthar //
T02TD1251E:235b-56: ston mo 'di dag brtsam par bya //
T02TD1251E:235b-57: der ni rtag tu brtag par bya //
T02TD1251E:235b-58: dung chen dgu dang ro yi gzugs //
T02TD1251E:235b-59: yang na stag gi pags pa dang //
T02TD1251E:236a-2: rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs nas //
T02TD1251E:236a-3: bzang po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1251E:236a-4: thams cad 'byor ba'am dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1251E:236a-5: bems po'i gnas su sreg blugs bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-6: shar lho byang dang dag phyogs su //
T02TD1251E:236a-7: phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-8: phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams //
T02TD1251E:236a-9: dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-10: lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1251E:236a-11: rgyal mtshan mtshon bsnun bdun 'khor dang //
T02TD1251E:236a-12: rgyal po sh'a li la sogs rdzas //
T02TD1251E:236a-13: ji bzhin byin brlab rim pa ni //
T02TD1251E:236a-14: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis //
T02TD1251E:236a-15: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-16: der ni ma dang sring mo dang //
T02TD1251E:236a-17: sring mo'i bu mo sgyug mo ste //
T02TD1251E:236a-18: de nas rgyas par mchod byas nas //
T02TD1251E:236a-20: thod pa chen po cha gcig pa //
T02TD1251E:236a-21: chang ni bzang pos bkang byas te //
T02TD1251E:236a-22: bla ma la dbul skal ldan ma //
T02TD1251E:236a-23: phyag btsal nas ni bdag btud bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-24: padma'i lag pas blang bar bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-25: lag pa de nyid kyis ni dbul //
T02TD1251E:236a-26: der ni sgrub pa po yis phyag / yang dang yang du bya ba'o //
T02TD1251E:236a-27: glu gar dngos grub rgyur gsungs pas //
T02TD1251E:236a-28: de dag gis kyang mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-29: kakko lar gnas po la ste //
T02TD1251E:236a-30: mu mmu ni kye kakko la //
T02TD1251E:236a-31: kye khyod kri pi ta brdung ba //
T02TD1251E:236a-32: snying rje ku co mi byed do //
T02TD1251E:236a-33: der ni ba la bza' bar bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-34: bsdams par ma da na btung ngo //
T02TD1251E:236a-35: kye ka li dza ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-36: du du ra ni spang bar bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-37: tsa au sa ma ka sthu ri //
T02TD1251E:236a-38: ga bur sihlas byug par bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-39: sh'a li ma la ti dam nam //
T02TD1251E:236a-40: der ni rkang pa bza' bar bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-41: phreng ba khan dang khe ta byed //
T02TD1251E:236a-42: dag dang ma dag mi blta'o //
T02TD1251E:236a-43: ni ram su yis yan lag brgyan //
T02TD1251E:236a-44: der ni shra pa rnam par gzhug / ma la dza ni kun du ru //
T02TD1251E:236a-45: din dam mam ni der mi spang //
T02TD1251E:236a-46: he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar //
T02TD1251E:236a-47: dran pa ma yengs rnal 'byor bya'o //
T02TD1251E:236a-48: bsgom par zhen pa'i sems kyis bya //
T02TD1251E:236a-49: chags dang ldan zhing goms pa'i sems //
T02TD1251E:236a-50: rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1251E:236a-51: rnal 'byor ma yis mi mo yi //
T02TD1251E:236a-52: glu dang gar ni 'di dag ste //
T02TD1251E:236a-53: mchog tu glu blang gar bya'o //
T02TD1251E:236a-55: de bzhin bdag kyang bsrung ba ste //
T02TD1251E:236a-57: 'di nyid sngags kyi bzlas pa ste //
T02TD1251E:236a-58: gang du dad pas glu blang dang//
T02TD1251E:236b-0: @236b gang du dad pas gar bya ba //
T02TD1251E:236b-1: tshogs kyi bdag pos sngon byas te /
T02TD1251E:236b-2: de la dri ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1251E:236b-3: dang por sgog pa la sogs dri //
T02TD1251E:236b-4: de nas yang ni bya rgod dri //
T02TD1251E:236b-5: de rjes ga pur ma la dza //
T02TD1251E:236b-6: glu yis byin rlabs mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1251E:236b-7: ngang pa'i skad dang bung pa'i skad //
T02TD1251E:236b-8: glu yis rjes su thos 'gyur te //
T02TD1251E:236b-9: ce spyang gi ni skad dag dang //
T02TD1251E:236b-10: phyi rol tshal du brtag par bya //
T02TD1251E:236b-11: sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor mas //
T02TD1251E:236b-12: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ston mo ni //
T02TD1251E:236b-13: gang du zos na dngos grub ni //
T02TD1251E:236b-15: de ltar glu gar bkra shis dang //
T02TD1251E:236b-16: smon lam cho ga kun rdzogs nas //
T02TD1251E:236b-17: yan lag rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te //
T02TD1251E:236b-18: dro rje dril bu blangs nas ni //
T02TD1251E:236b-19: bdag nyid rnal 'byor legs ldan pas //
T02TD1251E:236b-20: phud dang lhag ma kun bsres la //
T02TD1251E:236b-21: lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma gtang //
T02TD1251E:236b-22: de rjes sbyor ldan bde bar gnas //
T02TD1251E:236b-23: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las //
T02TD1251E:236b-24: tshogs kyi mchod pa'i bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02TD1251E:236b-26: // / mkhas pas gnas dang dus kun du //
T02TD1251E:236b-27: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed dang //
T02TD1251E:236b-28: bgegs ni zad cing zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:236b-29: gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya //
T02TD1251E:236b-30: rlung me thod pa la gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:236b-31: lcags kyu lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1251E:236b-32: 'bar dang skrod pa la sogs bsgrub //
T02TD1251E:236b-33: de nas phyogs gnas rnams dang ni //
T02TD1251E:236b-34: 'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1251E:236b-35: g-yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:236b-36: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol bya zhing //
T02TD1251E:236b-37: phyag rgya sgyur pa'i regs pas skrod //
T02TD1251E:236b-38: lta stangs dang ni dgra bgegs skrod //
T02TD1251E:236b-39: sngags dang bcas pa'i stang stabs kyis //
T02TD1251E:236b-40: shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya //
T02TD1251E:236b-41: rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni gzhan //
T02TD1251E:236b-42: sgo nas dag gis kyang ni mnan //
T02TD1251E:236b-43: lag pa g-yas dang g-yon dag gis //
T02TD1251E:236b-44: rol dang bcas pas mtha' sogs spro //
T02TD1251E:236b-45: cung zad bskyod pa'i sdigs mig dang //
T02TD1251E:236b-46: bcas pas smin ma rnam par bskyod //
T02TD1251E:236b-47: 'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i rgya //
T02TD1251E:236b-48: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang ba //
T02TD1251E:236b-49: g-yas bskum pa dang g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02TD1251E:236b-50: slob dpon gtso bo rdor 'chang gis //
T02TD1251E:236b-51: sbyor ba can sngags phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1251E:236b-52: pus stabs gtso bo rkang stabs dang //
T02TD1251E:236b-53: bskor ba'i stabs dang zlog pa'i stabs //
T02TD1251E:237a-2: / pus reg stabs dang g-yon 'debs stabs //
T02TD1251E:237a-3: bskor stabs seng ge'i mchongs stabs so //
T02TD1251E:237a-6: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang dang //
T02TD1251E:237a-7: sa ga zlum po'i stang stabs so //
T02TD1251E:237a-8: aom h'u% aam aam aam phat /
T02TD1251E:237a-10: mthun pa'i stabs dang mi mthun stabs //
T02TD1251E:237a-11: gcig bsdus g-yon bcang rkang stabs mchog / aom ha na m'a ra du shtam gh'a ta ya //
T02TD1251E:237a-14: dri yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa //
T02TD1251E:237a-15: me tog dkar sogs mchod byas te //
T02TD1251E:237a-16: dri dang 'bras mar kha ra zho //
T02TD1251E:237a-17: sbrang rtsi mar ldan shar sgor sbyin //
T02TD1251E:237a-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD1251E:237a-19: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar byas te //
T02TD1251E:237a-20: mthe chung lu gu rgyud bcings nas //
T02TD1251E:237a-21: zhags pa'i tshul sbyar mdzub gnyis sprel //
T02TD1251E:237a-23: lha rnams dgug par byed pa'o //
T02TD1251E:237a-24: aom ba ta li ma h'a ba ta li h'u% h'u% h'u% dza: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237a-25: aom a'a rgyu mo dang ni rgyu chen mo //
T02TD1251E:237a-26: nyin dang zla ba dngos grub bzhin //
T02TD1251E:237a-27: lta rgyal mo dang zla rgyal mo //
T02TD1251E:237a-28: lha mo au ma gang g'a dang //
T02TD1251E:237a-29: gzugs mdzes skar ma 'dus pa dang //
T02TD1251E:237a-30: gza' tshogs kun dang tshogs kyi gtso //
T02TD1251E:237a-31: karti ka dang dpal ldan mo //
T02TD1251E:237a-32: lha mo ri bong can 'dzin ma ;
T02TD1251E:237a-33: / aa ka la dang au pa gal //
T02TD1251E:237a-34: lha min lha yi rgyal po rnams //
T02TD1251E:237a-35: sbos mo dang ni sbos chen mo //
T02TD1251E:237a-36: mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:237a-37: h'u% he ho: a'a ka rsha ya a'a ka rsha ya sa ma ya dhe be h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:237a-38: dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1251E:237a-39: de nyid sdigs mdzub gnyis dkrol ba //
T02TD1251E:237a-40: tshim par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1251E:237a-41: se gol gsum brdabs sngags 'dis btang //
T02TD1251E:237a-42: aom bha ksha bha ksha sa ma ya ti shtha dzrum h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:237a-43: de dag ni lha'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1251E:237a-44: nub tu dri yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1251E:237a-45: me tog ser dang dkar pos mchod //
T02TD1251E:237a-46: 'o ma khrag bsres mngar gsum dang //
T02TD1251E:237a-47: 'o mas bkang ba'i gser snod dbul //
T02TD1251E:237a-48: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1251E:237a-49: sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya //
T02TD1251E:237a-50: aom ba ta la mi h'a ta la ba h'u% h'u% dza: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237a-51: klu rgyal mtha' yas nor rgyas bu //
T02TD1251E:237a-52: 'jog po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //
T02TD1251E:237b-1: dung skyong dang ni rigs ldan no //
T02TD1251E:237b-2: lha mo lha mo chen mo dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-3: zla ba'i spyi gtsug spyi gtsug che //
T02TD1251E:237b-5: be con chen po hu yin dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-6: dga' bo dang ni nyer dga' bo //
T02TD1251E:237b-7: rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-8: tsha ba tsha ba chen po dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-10: rjes su 'od dang mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-11: mdzes chen po dang sbrul bzangs dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-12: stobs po che dang tshi li dang //
T02TD1251E:237b-13: tshi li chen po pa rnams dag / mchod pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1251E:237b-14: aom a'a ga tstsha ya aa ga tstsha ya ma h'a n'a g'a dhi pa ti sarba bhu ra bhu phu phu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-15: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02TD1251E:237b-16: mthe bong mthe chung bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD1251E:237b-17: lag pa g-yas ni bar phye ste //
T02TD1251E:237b-18: sbrul gyi gdugs kyi tshul du sbyar //
T02TD1251E:237b-19: aom bha ksha ya bha ksha ya sa ma ya ti shtha dzr'um h'u% sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:237b-20: klu rnams dga' byed sngags phyag rgya //
T02TD1251E:237b-21: se gol gsum gtogs gtor bar bya //
T02TD1251E:237b-22: de dag ni klu'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1251E:237b-23: byang du dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa //
T02TD1251E:237b-24: tsandan dmar po la sogs bya //
T02TD1251E:237b-25: me tog dmar sogs nye bar brgyan //
T02TD1251E:237b-26: s'a lu'i 'bras chan sbrang rtsi zho //
T02TD1251E:237b-27: bdud rtsi lnga ldan snod bdun gzhag /'dod rgyal phyag rgya sngags 'dis dgug / aom nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang //
T02TD1251E:237b-28: bde ba bzang dang rgyal ba bzang //
T02TD1251E:237b-29: dga' ba'i phur bu phur bu che //
T02TD1251E:237b-30: phur bu bzang dang padma'i gtsug / dung gi gtsug phud gar dang ni //
T02TD1251E:237b-31: gar chen dang ni 'bigs byed ma //
T02TD1251E:237b-32: gcod byed ma dang rdzogs byed ma //
T02TD1251E:237b-33: nor dang nor kun nor bzang mo //
T02TD1251E:237b-34: gzugs bzang rol dang rol chen mo //
T02TD1251E:237b-35: bzhad dang rtse dang rnam par bskyod //
T02TD1251E:237b-36: dpal bzang dang ni gzugs mdzes ma //
T02TD1251E:237b-37: rdo rje dbang phyug bka' 'di yis //
T02TD1251E:237b-38: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-39: aom pu rna bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:237b-40: aom da na bha dr'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:237b-41: aom bee shra ba n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-42: aom bi dzi ku nda li ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-43: aom ki li mi li ni ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-44: aom mu na ke tra ya sva h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-45: aom dza le ndr'a ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:237b-46: nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang //
T02TD1251E:237b-47: nor sbyin bdag dang rnam thos sras //
T02TD1251E:237b-48: rgyal ba bzang po rol mo'i phreng //
T02TD1251E:237b-49: bzhin gyi dbang po 'gro ba'i dbang //
T02TD1251E:237b-50: de dag la sogs 'khor dang bcas //
T02TD1251E:238a-2: gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo spyan 'dren //
T02TD1251E:238a-3: h'u% he ho: a'a ka rsha ya a'a ka rsha ya sa ma ya ti be h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:238a-4: rdo rje bcings bskor snying gar gzhag / sngags 'dis mnyes par byas la btang //
T02TD1251E:238a-5: aom da na ti ba ti la phrum sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:238a-6: de la gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1251E:238a-7: rdo rje stabs kyis lhor gnas te //
T02TD1251E:238a-8: tsandan dmar po la sogs pas //
T02TD1251E:238a-9: phyi rol dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas //
T02TD1251E:238a-10: der ni me tog dmar po dgram //
T02TD1251E:238a-11: nya skam dang ni sha skam dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-12: sgog pa'i bi khu khrag gi snod //
T02TD1251E:238a-13: til gyi tshva mig khu ba rnams //
T02TD1251E:238a-14: khyad par du ni bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1251E:238a-15: rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-16: sran ma lnga dang sran chan gyis //
T02TD1251E:238a-17: gang ba'i snod ni mdun du gzhag /'dod rgyal phyag rgya sngags 'dis dgug / aom ba ta li ma h'a ba ta li //
T02TD1251E:238a-18: h'u% h'u% h'u% dza: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:238a-19: aom shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-20: ri dang brag dang phug gis //
T02TD1251E:238a-21: yul gyi 'dab dang lam dang zhing //
T02TD1251E:238a-22: khyad par du ni khyim stong dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-23: snod dang thang dang sa steng dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-24: khyad par gdol pa'i khyim gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:238a-25: nag po drag po drag chen po //
T02TD1251E:238a-26: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-28: dga' ba las 'das bgegs rgyal lo //
T02TD1251E:238a-29: rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-30: 'jigs byed ma dang dbu mar bstod //
T02TD1251E:238a-31: rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-32: thub med gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o //
T02TD1251E:238a-33: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
T02TD1251E:238a-34: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1251E:238a-35: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02TD1251E:238a-36: drag mo sdang ba lam ba ki //
T02TD1251E:238a-37: 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma //
T02TD1251E:238a-39: drag mo gzugs chen ma dang ni //
T02TD1251E:238a-40: mche ba gtsigs pa thod chen ma'o //
T02TD1251E:238a-41: thod phreng ba dang kha tvam ma //
T02TD1251E:238a-42: sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can //
T02TD1251E:238a-43: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu lag dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-44: lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-45: mkha' 'gro lnga yi de nyid dang //
T02TD1251E:238a-46: las kun rjes sgrub byed pa yi //
T02TD1251E:238a-47: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo //
T02TD1251E:238a-48: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso //
T02TD1251E:238a-49: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po //
T02TD1251E:238a-50: rdul med sbyor ba skye med ma //
T02TD1251E:238a-51: rdo rje dbang phyug ma bka' yis //
T02TD1251E:238a-52: thams cad thams cad 'ong bar byos //
T02TD1251E:238a-53: aom kakka dha na bha ndha na /
T02TD1251E:238a-54: kha kh'a da na sarba du shtam /
T02TD1251E:238b-0: ha na ha na sh'a ta @238b ya che ge mo h'u% h'u% h'u% phat phat dza: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:238b-1: khams gsum rnam rgyal rgya bcings te //
T02TD1251E:238b-2: mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la //
T02TD1251E:238b-3: aom ti shtha h'u% h'u% bha ksha phat dza: sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:238b-4: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis bya //
T02TD1251E:238b-5: se gol gsum gyis gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD1251E:238b-6: de dag ni 'byung po'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1251E:238b-7: 'byung po chen po'i gtor ma ni //
T02TD1251E:238b-8: lung gis rim par bshad par bya //
T02TD1251E:238b-9: nam mkha'i khams kyi nang gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:238b-11: shar gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam //
T02TD1251E:238b-12: lhor ni mthar byed dgod par bya //
T02TD1251E:238b-13: chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1251E:238b-14: de bzhin byang du nor sbyin dgod //
T02TD1251E:238b-15: me yi mtshams la me chen po //
T02TD1251E:238b-16: bden bral du ni srin po'i //
T02TD1251E:238b-17: nub byang mtshams su rlung lha ste //
T02TD1251E:238b-18: dbang ldan mtshams su 'byung po'i bdag / zla ba nyi ma tshangs la sogs //
T02TD1251E:238b-19: dam pa tshangs ris rnams dang ni //
T02TD1251E:238b-20: tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-21: dga' ldan dang ni 'tshe ma dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-22: yang dag par byung rgyal chen dang//
T02TD1251E:238b-23: gzhan 'phrul dbang ni byed pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-24: 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-25: gtsang ma'i gnas la gnas pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-26: bde chen yang dag gnas pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-27: mi chung bar ni gnas pa dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-29: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1251E:238b-30: de dag thams cad steng du dgod //
T02TD1251E:238b-31: chos kyi 'byung gnas nang gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:238b-32: stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-33: mtha' yas nor rgyas de bzhin te //
T02TD1251E:238b-34: 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-35: pad chen shin du padma dang //
T02TD1251E:238b-36: lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams //
T02TD1251E:238b-37: chos 'byung smad du bsam par bya //
T02TD1251E:238b-38: yi ge aom las tshangs la sogs //
T02TD1251E:238b-39: brgya byin la sogs h'u% yig las //
T02TD1251E:238b-40: stobs kyi rgyu sogs aa yig ste //
T02TD1251E:238b-41: phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa'o //
T02TD1251E:238b-42: steng gi lha rnams dkar po ste //
T02TD1251E:238b-43: dbang po la sogs nag po'i mdog / stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che //
T02TD1251E:238b-44: rang mdog rig mas yan lag 'khyud //
T02TD1251E:238b-45: lag na rdo rje dril bu bcas //
T02TD1251E:238b-46: stan la g-yas brkyang yang dag gnas //
T02TD1251E:238b-47: tshangs sogs rtag pa'i phyag rgyas gdab //
T02TD1251E:238b-48: brgya byin la sogs rdo rje yis //
T02TD1251E:238b-49: gar dbang gis ni stobs rgyu sogs //
T02TD1251E:238b-50: thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa //
T02TD1251E:238b-51: goo r'i yis ni dgug byas la //
T02TD1251E:239a-2: ro langs mas ni lcags sgrog sdom //
T02TD1251E:239a-3: za phod mas ni dril bus dbang //
T02TD1251E:239a-4: de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil sbyin //
T02TD1251E:239a-5: cho gas gtor ma bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1251E:239a-6: rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1251E:239a-7: aa las byung ba'i pad snod bsam //
T02TD1251E:239a-8: 'bar ba dang ni khros pa yis //
T02TD1251E:239a-9: bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1251E:239a-10: cha yi rang bzhin 'di bsgoms nas //
T02TD1251E:239a-11: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs la btang /
T02TD1251E:239a-12: aom aa nda dza ma dza la dza ksha bh'u ta ba hni /
T02TD1251E:239a-14: tsanda sudzdza m'a da pappa ta la b'a t'a la aa shta sa pa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:239a-15: ai dam ba lim bhu dza dzi gha phulla dhuppa m'am sa pim gha aa mbha sappa ka dzdza s'a dha kha nti khu ni phe da gha ta aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna t'a ta aom a'a: h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1251E:239a-16: rab tu mchod de bstod nas ni //
T02TD1251E:239a-17: 'dod pa'i don kun sgo nas kyang //
T02TD1251E:239a-18: de nas dgyes byas gshegs gsol ba //
T02TD1251E:239a-19: yi ge brgya pa bya ba ste //
T02TD1251E:239a-20: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD1251E:239a-22: badzra satva tve no pa ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:239a-24: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1251E:239a-25: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1251E:239a-26: sha shva to me bha ba /
T02TD1251E:239a-27: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD1251E:239a-28: dhi da ya me aa dhi ti shtha /
T02TD1251E:239a-29: sarba siddhi me pra ya tstsha /
T02TD1251E:239a-30: sarba karma su tsa me tsi ta tam shri ya: ku ru h'u% ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD1251E:239a-31: bha ga w'an m'a me mu nytsa badzri bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: mu: mkhas pas gtor mas mchod byas nas //
T02TD1251E:239a-32: lha mnyes 'byung po kun legs byed //
T02TD1251E:239a-34: zhi rgyas dbang sogs las rnams 'grub //
T02TD1251E:239a-35: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las //
T02TD1251E:239a-36: gtor ma'i bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1251E:239a-38: // / mkhas pas gong du gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1251E:239a-39: gtor ma la sogs dus dag tu //
T02TD1251E:239a-40: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yi //
T02TD1251E:239a-41: rgyal ba 'khor bcas mchod par bya //
T02TD1251E:239a-42: me tog spos dang mar me dang //
T02TD1251E:239a-43: dri yi dung sogs g-yas su gzhag //
T02TD1251E:239a-44: g-yon du mchod yon mdun du snod /
T02TD1251E:239a-45: bzhag ste byin gyis brlabs la dbul //
T02TD1251E:239a-46: dang por chu gtsang nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1251E:239a-47: bsang gtor rab tu dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:239a-48: aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'u% //
T02TD1251E:239a-49: gnyis pa dri yi chu yis ni //
T02TD1251E:239a-50: zhabs bsil dag ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:239a-51: aom ni ri ti h'u% kham //
T02TD1251E:239a-52: gsum pa la ni 'o ma mngar //
T02TD1251E:239b-0: zhal bsil du ni @239b dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:239b-1: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1251E:239b-2: bzhi par mtheb mdzub gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD1251E:239b-3: me tog dag ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:239b-5: dri med dag cing yid 'ong bar //
T02TD1251E:239b-6: sngags kyi yon chab mchog 'di dag / bdag ni dad pas dbul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-7: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //

T02TD1251E:239b-9: me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge / dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa //
T02TD1251E:239b-10: bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-11: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu shpa p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'u%/
T02TD1251E:239b-13: tshal dag ro ni phan pa dang //
T02TD1251E:239b-14: gang zhig dri yi bdug spos rnams //
T02TD1251E:239b-15: bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-16: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'a pa p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'u%/
T02TD1251E:239b-18: srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa //
T02TD1251E:239b-19: dge zhing mun sel mar me 'di //
T02TD1251E:239b-20: bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-21: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa lo ke p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'u%/
T02TD1251E:239b-23: 'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste //
T02TD1251E:239b-24: dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa //
T02TD1251E:239b-25: bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-26: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'u%/

T02TD1251E:239b-31: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta /

T02TD1251E:239b-34: dbyangs kyi nga ro ldan pa 'di //
T02TD1251E:239b-35: bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD1251E:239b-36: bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1251E:239b-37: aom badzra gha nde ra ni ta pra ra ni ta sam pra ra ni ta /
T02TD1251E:239b-38: sarba buddha kshe tra pra dznya p'a ra mi t'a n'a da sva bh'a be de badzra dha rm'a /
T02TD1251E:239b-39: dri da ya ni sa nto sha ni phrim h'u% h'u% h'u%/
T02TD1251E:239b-40: thod pa rdzas kyis rab bkang pa //
T02TD1251E:239b-41: rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD1251E:239b-42: thabs dang shes rab ye shes lnga //
T02TD1251E:239b-43: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1251E:240a-2: sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar la //
T02TD1251E:240a-4: mthe bo'i thor mas so sor dbyul //
T02TD1251E:240a-5: de yi dbus nas blangs nas ni //
T02TD1251E:240a-6: rang gis bdud rtsi'i ro myang bya //
T02TD1251E:240a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1251E:240a-9: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02TD1251E:240a-10: rked pa'i mtshams su gzhag par bya //
T02TD1251E:240a-11: khro bo sgeg dang bzhad pa dang //

T02TD1251E:240a-13: spos la yal ga'i sbyor ba dang //

T02TD1251E:240a-15: byug pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris //

T02TD1251E:240a-22: bud pa'i tshul gyis bud pa dang //

T02TD1251E:240a-24: brdab pa'i tshul gyis rdeb pa dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-25: gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod //

T02TD1251E:240a-30: gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-31: cang te'u tshul gyis dkrol ba dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-32: 'khar rnga'i tshul gyis brdung pa dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-33: bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-34: khro ba'i tshul gyis khro ba dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-35: sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang //
T02TD1251E:240a-36: bsgying [?] ba'i tshul gyis bsgyings pa dang //

T02TD1251E:240b-21: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1251E:240b-22: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1251E:240b-24: glu ni rdo rje can la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-25: gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-26: hi ra mchog la de bzhin dri //
T02TD1251E:240b-27: 'jig rten mchog la bza' dang bca' //
T02TD1251E:240b-28: gos kyi mchod pa rta mchog la //
T02TD1251E:240b-29: 'di rnams mchod pa dam pa se //
T02TD1251E:240b-30: rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yis //
T02TD1251E:240b-31: rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed //
T02TD1251E:240b-32: aa ka ru nag kye rdo rje //
T02TD1251E:240b-33: phan pa la ni tsandan dkar //
T02TD1251E:240b-34: dmar po 'jig rten rje la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-35: gur kum rdo rje snang ba la //
T02TD1251E:240b-36: bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad de //
T02TD1251E:240b-37: h'u% rdo rje las byung ba'i dri //
T02TD1251E:240b-38: 'di rnams dri yis rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1251E:240b-39: dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo //
T02TD1251E:240b-40: kha dang tsha ba rdo rjer dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-41: mngar ba rdo rje rtag la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-42: skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la //
T02TD1251E:240b-43: de bzhin lam tshva 'jig rten dbang //
T02TD1251E:240b-44: rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam //
T02TD1251E:240b-45: bska ba yang ni rab brtag bya //
T02TD1251E:240b-46: kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyis //
T02TD1251E:240b-47: me tog mdog nag rkang thung 'byung //
T02TD1251E:240b-48: ma lli ka dang mi la ti //
T02TD1251E:240b-49: kun da sangs rgyas rtag tu dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-50: shing gi dbang mchog dri med mchog / snang byed la ni sbyor bar bya //
T02TD1251E:240b-51: dbang mchog dmar po'i chu skyes dang //
T02TD1251E:240b-52: ba ndu dmar po pa ta lam //
T02TD1251E:240b-53: padma gar gyi dbang la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-54: rta mchog rdo rje can la dbul //
T02TD1251E:240b-55: rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa //
T02TD1251E:241a-2: gang gi rnam rtog rnam spangs te //
T02TD1251E:241a-3: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms shing //
T02TD1251E:241a-4: lus dang sems ni rnam dag pa //
T02TD1251E:241a-5: de yi mchod pa bla na med //
T02TD1251E:241a-6: sems can gang gis dbu ma yi //
T02TD1251E:241a-7: theg pa bsgom pa ma bsgoms na //
T02TD1251E:241a-8: theg pa dman la lhag mos pas //
T02TD1251E:241a-9: de yi mchod pa kun rdzob yin //
T02TD1251E:241a-10: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1251E:241a-11: bzlas dang bsgom la mngon dga' zhing //
T02TD1251E:241a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pas //
T02TD1251E:241a-15: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las //
T02TD1251E:241a-16: mchod pa'i bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T02TD1251E:241a-18: // / sa gsum gang yin dri bcas de yi phyir //
T02TD1251E:241a-19: de las 'das pa dam pa'i yid brtan nas //
T02TD1251E:241a-20: shes rab thabs ldan rgyal ba'i lam gcig nyid //
T02TD1251E:241a-21: zab cing rgya che rtog ge'i yul ma yin //
T02TD1251E:241a-22: de phyir bla ma'i man ngag brgyud rim gyis //
T02TD1251E:241a-23: rgyal ba'i dbang po bdud rtsi bcud kyi mdzod //
T02TD1251E:241a-24: sngags tshul rgya mtsho'i lam ni mdor bsdus pa //
T02TD1251E:241a-25: kye yi rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam //
T02TD1251E:241a-26: gang zhig rten cing 'brel pa'i chos 'di dag / rgyu rkyen tshogs las 'bras bu tha dad pa //
T02TD1251E:241a-27: chos nyid kyis thob nus pa bsam las 'das //
T02TD1251E:241a-28: de 'dra'i kun rdzob chud son mi byed cing //
T02TD1251E:241a-29: de ltar rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:241a-30: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med rtogs pa'i //
T02TD1251E:241a-31: shes rab nor gyis ma pham de dag la //
T02TD1251E:241a-32: rin chen 'bar 'dis brgyan pa mdzes 'gyur gyi //
T02TD1251E:241a-33: gang zhig kun rdzob rgyu 'bras chud son cing //
T02TD1251E:241a-34: don dam tshul la mi mkhas rmongs gyur pa //
T02TD1251E:241a-35: shes rab nor med dbul po de dag la //
T02TD1251E:241a-36: mdzes par mi 'gyur mi ro brgyan pa 'dra //
T02TD1251E:241a-37: mkhas pa bdag 'dzin zhen pa'i mdud bkrol te //
T02TD1251E:241a-38: bdag gzhan bla med byang chub bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1251E:241a-39: snying rje'i go bgos shes rab thabs ldan pas //
T02TD1251E:241a-40: lus ngag yid kyis mi bya yod ma yin //
T02TD1251E:241a-41: de phyir dam pa'i grogs kyis gsol btab pas //
T02TD1251E:241a-42: mkhas pa rnams kyi lam srol rnyil pa nas //
T02TD1251E:241a-43: shes rab mig dang rigs pa'i rkang pa yis //
T02TD1251E:241a-44: legs brtags bgrod la nyes pa'i 'jigs bral 'di //
T02TD1251E:241b-0: byas la bsod nams thob pa gang yod @241b des //
T02TD1251E:241b-1: rin chen 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs lam 'di nas //
T02TD1251E:241b-2: 'gro kun 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho myur brgal te //
T02TD1251E:241b-3: kye yi rdo rje'i go 'phang myur thob shog //
T02TD1251E:241b-4: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam rin chen 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1251E:241b-6: // / slob dpon mkhas pa chen po pra dzny'a ai nta ru tsi'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1251E:241b-8: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
T02TD1251E:241b-9: dge slong sh'akya ye shes gyis bsgrub cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
